NK001(ka)032:0: rab byung gi gzhi'i cho ga rin chen them skas zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
NK001(ka)032:1: rab byung gi gzhi'i cho ga rin chen them skas zhes bya ba /
NK001(ka)032:2: ston pa thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK001(ka)032:3: mkhyen pas srid las rnam grol zhing //
NK001(ka)032:4: snying rjes gdul bya 'dul ba'i thabs //
NK001(ka)032:5: ston mdzad thub dbang lha yi lha //
NK001(ka)032:8: 'khor ba'i rmongs mun bsal mdzad pa //
NK001(ka)032:10: dgongs pa rab tu gsal des skyongs //
NK001(ka)032:11: nges 'byung tshul khrims ma smad pa'i //
NK001(ka)032:12: rin chen them skas la 'dzegs nas //
NK001(ka)032:13: rnam grol khang bzang nyams dga' bar //
NK001(ka)032:14: 'khrid thabs las kyi cho ga bshad //
NK001(ka)032:16: tshigs snga ma dge tshul du sgrub pa'i dang /
NK001(ka)032:17: phyi ma bsnyen rdzogs su sgrub pa'i cho ga'o //
NK001(ka)032:19: ga mar ston pa'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar mchod bsham /
NK001(ka)032:23: chu tshags sogs sta gon byas nas /
NK001(ka)032:24: bsgrub bya de mdun du tsog tsog por 'dug tu bcug pa la /
NK001(ka)032:25: mkhan po nyid du phyogs pa'i dge slong des bar chad dri ste /
NK001(ka)032:26: khyod sngon gyi dge ba dang smon lam gyi dbang
NK001(ka)032:27: gis mtho ris kyi rten phun sum tshogs pa thob
NK001(ka)032:28: pa don yod par bya ba'i ched du sangs rgyas
NK001(ka)032:29: kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba byed pa
NK001(ka)032:30: ni shin tu skal ba bzang po yin /
NK001(ka)032:31: de la bstan pa'i snying po tshul khrims kyi bslab
NK001(ka)032:32: pa 'di bar chad dang mi ldan pa'i gang zag
NK001(ka)032:33: rgyud dag ba zhig la sbyin dgos /
NK001(ka)032:34: bar chad yod med kho bos dris pa las rtogs
NK001(ka)032:35: pas dri ba 'di rnams la lan drang por thob
NK001(ka)032:36: cig / khyod mu stegs can ma yin nam /
NK001(ka)032:37: lo bco lnga ma lon pa ma yin nam /
NK001(ka)032:38: lo bco lnga lon pa bya rog skrod mi nus pa ma yin nam /
NK001(ka)032:39: bya rog skrod nus pa lo bdun ma lon pa
NK001(ka)032:40: bran la sogs pa ma bu lon chags pa ma
NK001(ka)032:41: pha mas ma gnang ba ma pha mas ma gnang
NK001(ka)032:42: ba yul thag mi ring ba ma nad pa ma
NK001(ka)032:43: dge slong ma sun phyung ba ma rku thabs su
NK001(ka)032:44: gnas pa ma tha dad du gnas pa ma gnas
NK001(ka)032:45: par mi bya ba ma za ma ma ma ning
NK001(ka)032:46: ma sprul pa ma dud 'gro ma mu stegs can
NK001(ka)032:47: zhugs pa ma ma bsad pa ma pha bsad pa
NK001(ka)032:48: ma dgra bcom pa bsad pa ma dge 'dun gyi
NK001(ka)032:49: dbyen byas pa ma de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan
NK001(ka)032:50: sems kyis khrag phyung ba ma pha ma par gyur
NK001(ka)032:51: pa'i ltung ba bzhi po dag las gang yang rung
NK001(ka)032:52: ba byung ba ma rgyu las zlog pa'i chad pa
NK001(ka)032:53: khas mi len pa gnas nas phyung ba ma lag
NK001(ka)032:54: rdum la sogs pa ma skra ser la sogs pa
NK001(ka)032:55: ma sen mo gcig pa la sog pa ma rgyal
NK001(ka)032:56: pos bkrabs pa la sogs pa rgyal pos ma gnang
NK001(ka)032:57: ba ma rgyal pos ma gnang ba yul thag mi
NK001(ka)032:58: ring ba ma chom rkun par grags pa ma phung
NK001(ka)032:59: krol ba ma lhwam mkhan gdol pa ma g.yung po
NK001(ka)032:60: ma mi ma yin pa'i 'gro ba mir bardzu ba
NK001(ka)032:61: ma byang gi sgra mi snyan pa ma mtshan lan
NK001(ka)032:62: gsum du 'gyur pa ma skyes pa 'dra ba'i bud
NK001(ka)032:63: med ma sdig sdig lta bu'i mtshan nyid can ma
NK001(ka)032:64: \nga gzhan nas skyes pa'i tshul byad mi 'dra ba
NK001(ka)032:65: ma yin nam / zhes dris pas /
NK001(ka)032:68: 'o na kho bos khyod rab tu dbyung bar bya'o //
NK001(ka)032:70: . nas sgrub byed ston pa dang rang la phyag gsum gsum 'tshal du bcug ga nas /
NK001(ka)032:71: mdun du tsog tsog por 'dug cing thal mo snying khar sbyar du bcug ste /
NK001(ka)032:72: khyod rab tu 'byung bar byed pa la 'gal rkyen
NK001(ka)032:73: bar chad dang bral ba gcig bus mi chog gi
NK001(ka)032:74: / mthun rkyen cho ga rnam par dag pa la brten dgos shing /
NK001(ka)032:75: . yang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la rim gyis
NK001(ka)032:76: bslab pa'i don du thog mar dge bsnyen gyi sdom
NK001(ka)032:77: pa blang dgos pas bsam pa 'di bzhin du gyis
NK001(ka)032:78: / khams gsum 'khor ba 'di mtho dman gang du
NK001(ka)032:79: skyes kyang sdug basngala gyi rang bzhin las ma 'das
NK001(ka)032:80: pas 'khor ba spangs te rnam grol gtan gyi bde
NK001(ka)032:81: / ba sgrub / de'i ched du dkon mchog gsum
NK001(ka)032:82: skyabs gnas su bzung nas yongs rdzogs dge bsnyen gyi
NK001(ka)032:83: sdom pa blangs te ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsrung
NK001(ka)032:84: snyam pa gyis la rjes zlos gyis /
NK001(ka)032:86: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung ste /
NK001(ka)032:87: ji srid 'tsho'i bar du rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o //
NK001(ka)032:88: 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi mchog /
NK001(ka)032:92: bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dge bsnyen du btsun pas bzung du gsol /
NK001(ka)032:94: lan gsum pa 'di la skyabs barjoda dang bdag barjoda
NK001(ka)032:95: gnyis rdzogs pa dge bsnyen du zhes pa'i skabs su
NK001(ka)032:96: kho bos se gol gyi brda byas pa dang mnyam
NK001(ka)032:97: du sdom pa skye ba yin pas /
NK001(ka)032:98: dus der sdom pa thob snyam pa dang /
NK001(ka)032:99: . nas nged la'ng slob dpon zhes barjoda dgos pas de yid la zhog la rjes zlos gyis /
NK001(ka)032:103: zhes pa' lan du slob mas /
NK001(ka)032:106: .sa khyod kyis dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa thob pa yin pas /
NK001(ka)032:107: de'i bslab pa'i gzhi lnga po 'phags ba dgra bcom
NK001(ka)032:108: pa rnams kyis ji ltar bsrungs pa bzhin du bdag
NK001(ka)032:109: gis kyang bsrung snyam pas rjes zlos gyis /
NK001(ka)032:111: ji ltar 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag gis
NK001(ka)032:112: ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spangs te
NK001(ka)032:113: srog gcod pa las slar log pa de bzhin du
NK001(ka)032:114: / bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas kyang /
NK001(ka)032:115: dus 'di nas bzung ste ji srid 'tsho'i bar du
NK001(ka)032:116: srog gcod pa spangs te srog gcod pa las slar
NK001(ka)032:117: ldog par bagyi'o // yan lag dang po'i 'dis bdag
NK001(ka)032:118: 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag gi bslab pa
NK001(ka)032:122: gzhan yang ji ltar 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de
NK001(ka)032:123: dag gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du ma byin par
NK001(ka)032:124: len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /
NK001(ka)032:127: bcos pa'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas spangs te /
NK001(ka)032:129: bcos pa'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med gnas las slar log pa de bzhin du /
NK001(ka)032:130: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas kyang /
NK001(ka)032:131: dus 'di nas bzung ste ji srid 'tsho'i bar du ma byin par len par dang /
NK001(ka)032:132: 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /
NK001(ka)032:135: bcos pa'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med gnas spangs te /
NK001(ka)032:137: bcos pa'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas las slar ldog par bagyi'o //
NK001(ka)032:138: yan lag lnga po 'dis bdag 'phags pa dgra bcom
NK001(ka)032:139: pa de dag gi bslab pa la rjes su slob
NK001(ka)032:142: zhes lan gcig gi mthar sngar bzhin thabs legs bya'o //
NK001(ka)032:143: . ltar mkhan por phyogs pas bar chad dris nas
NK001(ka)032:144: bsgrub bya rgyud dag par grub pa de rang gis
NK001(ka)032:145: dge bsnyen du bsgrubs pa'i rjes de nas zhu ba
NK001(ka)032:146: byed ba'i dge slong chos bcu ldan zhig la /
NK001(ka)032:147: dge slong dge ba'i bshes gnyen che ge mos /
NK001(ka)032:148: tshe dang ldan pa 'di dge 'dun la rab tu 'byung ba'i zhu ba mdzod cig /
NK001(ka)032:151: ci tshe dang ldan pa 'di'i bar chad kyi chos rnams yongs su dag gam /
NK001(ka)032:154: yongs su dag go zhes kho na nyid mchi yin gad'i /
NK001(ka)032:156: . nas bskos pa de bsgrub byed khrid nas gnas
NK001(ka)032:157: khang so sor 'khod pa'i dge 'dun la zhus kyang
NK001(ka)032:158: rung mo. // .nga sang dge 'dun thams cad gnas
NK001(ka)032:159: khang gcig tu 'dus pa la zhu ba nyid phyag
NK001(ka)032:161: bsgrub bya de mkhan po ma gtogs dge slong rgan rim nas phyag gsum gsum 'tshal du bcug la /
NK001(ka)032:162: gos dkar po dang ldan pas tsog tsog por 'dug cing thal mo sbyor du bcug ste /
NK001(ka)032:163: rang rgan pa'i mthar logs su 'grengs te 'dud pa dang bcas pas /
NK001(ka)032:164: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
NK001(ka)032:165: ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di mkhan po ming 'di
NK001(ka)032:166: zhes bgyi ba las rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal te
NK001(ka)032:167: / khyim pa gos dkar po can skra dang kha spu ma bregs pa las /
NK001(ka)032:168: legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal te /
NK001(ka)032:169: ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di rab tu 'byung bar
NK001(ka)032:170: 'tshal zhing skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur
NK001(ka)032:171: smrig bgos te / yang dag pa kho nar dad
NK001(ka)032:172: pas khyim nas khyim med par mkhan po ming 'di
NK001(ka)032:173: zhes bgyi ba las rab tu 'byung ste /
NK001(ka)032:174: . yang bar chad kyi chos rnams yongs su dag go zhes kho na nyid mchi nas /
NK001(ka)032:175: ci de rab tu dbyung ngam /
NK001(ka)032:176: zhes pa'i lan du dge 'dun rnams kyis /
NK001(ka)032:177: gal te yongs su dag na'o //
NK001(ka)032:179: . yang 'dir bsgrub bya gcig gi dbang du byas pa ste /
NK001(ka)032:183: ci de la ci de dag /
NK001(ka)032:184: kho na nyid la khong dag nyid /
NK001(ka)032:187: dag zhes pa'i gnas su rnams zhes bsgyur zhing /
NK001(ka)032:188: ming 'di zhes bgyi ba las zhes bde /
NK001(ka)032:189: rang gi mkhan po yin na /
NK001(ka)032:190: .na gyi slad du mtshan nas smos na mkhan po ming 'di zhes bgyi ba zhes dang /
NK001(ka)032:193: rang gi mkhan slob min na /
NK001(ka)032:195: dge ba'i bshes gnyen zhes nye tshig gis barjoda pa
NK001(ka)032:196: sogs rnam dbye dang tshig phrad skabs thob kyis bsgyur
NK001(ka)032:197: tshul gong 'og thams cad du 'khyer shes par bya'o
NK001(ka)032:198: // . nas mkhan por phyogs pas bsgrub bya de rang la phyag gsum 'tshal du bcug nas /
NK001(ka)032:199: mdun du tsog tsog por thal sbyar gyis 'dug tu bcug ste /
NK001(ka)032:200: khyod rab tu byung ba byed pa de rang zhugs
NK001(ka)032:201: su byas pas mi yong bas byed pa por gyur
NK001(ka)032:203: de'i rgyu mtshan sngon ston pa rdzogs sangs rgyas nas
NK001(ka)032:204: ring po ma lon pa'i dus kyi gdul bya rnams
NK001(ka)032:205: ni rang bzhin gyis dbang po dul zhing bag dang
NK001(ka)032:206: ldan la / na tsha sogs kyang 'byung dkon pas
NK001(ka)032:207: 'khrid cing skyong bar byed pa la mi ltos pa'i
NK001(ka)032:208: phyir mkhan slob med par rdzogs pa yin gyi /
NK001(ka)032:209: dus phyis kyi gang zag rnams de lta bu ma
NK001(ka)032:210: yin pas da ltar gyi cho gas rab tu 'byung
NK001(ka)032:211: ba'i mthun rkyen gyi gtso bo mkhan po yin /
NK001(ka)032:216: bi k+aa ra na lung 'bogs pa ste /
NK001(ka)032:217: brtse bas 'khor bar ltung ba las nye bar 'dzin la /
NK001(ka)032:218: bslab pa rin po che la nye bar sbyor ba'i rkyen sgrub cing /
NK001(ka)032:219: 'jug ldog gi bslab bya rnams nye- bar lung 'bogs par byed pa zhig yin /
NK001(ka)032:220: . yang btsun pa brtan pa'i yon tan dang /
NK001(ka)032:221: mkhas shing phan thogs pa'i yon tan te /
NK001(ka)032:222: brtan mkhas kyi yon tan gnyis dang ldan pa zhig dgos pa kho bos 'grub rung du yod pas /
NK001(ka)032:223: }ra dge bsnyen gyi slob dpon la da rab byung
NK001(ka)032:224: gi mkhan po zhu snyam pa gyis la 'di'i rjes
NK001(ka)032:225: zlos gyis / slob dpon dgongs su gsol /
NK001(ka)032:226: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba slob dpon la mkhan por gsol gyi /
NK001(ka)032:227: slob dpon bdag gi mkhan po mdzad du gsol /
NK001(ka)032:228: slob dpon mkhan pos rab tu dbyung bar bagyi'o //
NK001(ka)032:229: zhes lan gsum bzlas pa'i gsum pa /
NK001(ka)032:230: mkhan po mkhan pos zhes bsgyur zhing /
NK001(ka)032:232: . nas mkhan pos grogs dan la /
NK001(ka)032:233: dge slong 'di zhes bya bas tshe dang ldan pa 'di'i skra dang kha spu zhes sam /
NK001(ka)032:234: bregs tshar na gtsug phud 'breg par mdzo.- cig /
NK001(ka)032:236: .sa kyang skra dang kha spu 'breg dgos na gtsug phud ma gtogs pa bregs nas /
NK001(ka)032:237: de'i 'og tu- ci gtsug phud 'breg par spro'am zhes dri /
NK001(ka)032:238: spro lags zer na bregs te khrus byed du bcug la /
NK001(ka)032:239: mkhan po'i zhabs la gtugs pa'i phyag byas te /
NK001(ka)032:240: mdun du tsog tsog por 'dug pa la mkhan pos bla gos gtad de gnyis kas bzung nas /
NK001(ka)032:241: 'di stod du rgyun du gyon par byed pa'i chos gos bla gos zhes bya ba /
NK001(ka)032:242: khyim pa dang mu stegs can las rtags khyad par du gyur /
NK001(ka)032:243: dge sbyong gi dran pa gso /
NK001(ka)032:244: tsha grang gi reg pa las skyob pa'i gos su gnang bas /
NK001(ka)032:245: ston pa sangs rgyas kyis ji ltar bsnams pa bzhin
NK001(ka)032:246: du gyon nas sems zhi dul dang ldan par gyis
NK001(ka)032:248: 'di smad kyi nang du gyon par byed pa'i chos gos mthang gos zhes bya ba /
NK001(ka)032:250: tsha grang gi reg pa las skyob /
NK001(ka)032:251: khyim pa dang mu-stegs can las rtags khyad par du gyur /
NK001(ka)032:252: dge sbyong gi dran pa gso ba'i gos su gnang bas /
NK001(ka)032:253: ston pa sangs rgyas kyis sogs sngar ltar /
NK001(ka)032:255: 'di lhung bzed ces bya ba khyim pa dang mu
NK001(ka)032:256: stegs byed sogs las snod spyad kyi rtags khyad par
NK001(ka)032:257: du gyur / 'di zas kyi 'gengs pa bzhin du rang gi shes rgyud yon tan gyis 'geng /
NK001(ka)032:258: 'di'i nang nas zas la longs spyod pa bzhin du chos la spyod pa'i brdar /
NK001(ka)032:259: bsod snyoms kyi zas lhung ba bzed pa'i don du gnang bas /
NK001(ka)032:262: 'di chos gos gding ba zhes bya ba /
NK001(ka)032:263: dge 'dun gyi r+ts+wa'i gdan ma gtogs pa'i gnas mal dang /
NK001(ka)032:265: gang zag gi khra bo phal cher ma nyams pa la spyod pa na /
NK001(ka)032:266: 'dis skyobs te chud ma zos par spyod dgos pas /
NK001(ka)032:267: de'i ched du 'chang bar gyis shig /
NK001(ka)032:269: 'di chu tshags zhes bya ba yin te /
NK001(ka)032:270: rab tu 'byung ba rnams ni sems can la gnod pa gzhi dang bcas pa las ldog dgos pas /
NK001(ka)032:271: spyi sems can thams cad la gnod pa spang dgos shing /
NK001(ka)032:272: khyad par chu la longs spyod pa'i tshe 'dis srog
NK001(ka)032:273: chags rnams rang gi gnas su dor nas chu gtsang
NK001(ka)032:274: ma la longs spyod pa'i ched du gnang ba yin
NK001(ka)032:277: 'dir mdo rtsar gos ngur smrig ster ba tsam las ma gsungs kyang /
NK001(ka)032:278: lung dang karma sha tam las lhung bzed sbyin par gsungs shing /
NK001(ka)032:279: gding ba chu tshags gnyis ster dgos pa'i gsal kha med kyang ster ba phyag len no //
NK001(ka)032:280: . ltar gos sbyin nas mkhan po rang nyid kyis bskon zhing /
NK001(ka)032:281: zhar la mtshan ma tshor bar brtag /
NK001(ka)032:284: 'di'i gos tshags slob pa dang bdag gi bya ba yang sgrubs mdzod cig /
NK001(ka)032:286: .sa kyang gon lugs bslab cing mtshan brtags pas skyon med na /
NK001(ka)032:287: bar chad dang mi ldan par gda' zhes brda spra. /
NK001(ka)032:288: gos bskon pa' tshe gzhung nas ma bshad kyang phyag len la /
NK001(ka)032:289: kun gyis me tog 'thor ba dang bcas /
NK001(ka)032:290: thar pa'i rgyal mtshan brtan par gyur cig /
NK001(ka)032:291: tshangs par spyod pa tshe mthar phyin par gyur cig /
NK001(ka)032:292: tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
NK001(ka)032:293: tshe rabs thams cad du rab tu 'byung ba thob par gyur cig /
NK001(ka)032:295: . nas bsgrub bya de ston pa dang mkhan po la phyag gsum gsum 'tshal du bcug nas /
NK001(ka)032:296: mdun du tsog tsog por 'dug cing thal mo snying gar sbyor du bcug ste /
NK001(ka)032:297: khyod rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa de legs /
NK001(ka)032:299: dga' bo rab tu byung ba'i mdo las /
NK001(ka)032:300: khyim pa rnams ni me'i 'obs na gnas pa lta bu'o //
NK001(ka)032:301: rab tu byung ba rnams ni bsil khang na gnas pa lta bu'o //
NK001(ka)032:303: cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa'i mdo las kyang /
NK001(ka)032:304: smad par bya ba'i khyim la brten pa de //
NK001(ka)032:305: bla med byang chub dam pa gzhar mi thob //
NK001(ka)032:307: khyim gyis skrag ste khyim nas mngon byung ba //
NK001(ka)032:308: . dag byang chub mchog 'di rnyed mi dka' //
NK001(ka)032:309: zhes gsungs pa ltar khyim pa rnams ni 'dod yon gyis bcings pas byang chub thob dka' zhing /
NK001(ka)032:310: rab tu byung ba rnams ni 'dod yon la rang
NK001(ka)032:311: gi ngang gis chags pa dang bral bar byed nus
NK001(ka)032:312: pa'i dbang gis byang chub dam pa rnyed sla ba
NK001(ka)032:313: yin pas / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad
NK001(ka)032:314: kyang rab tu byung ba'i rten las sangs rgyas shing
NK001(ka)032:316: rgyu mtshan des rab tu byung ba ni don che zhing bsod nams che ste /
NK001(ka)032:317: dga' bo rab tu byung ba'i mdo las /
NK001(ka)032:318: stong gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyis bskal pa'i
NK001(ka)032:319: bar du bu dang chung ma sbyin par btang ba'i
NK001(ka)032:320: bsod nams bas rab tu 'byung ba'i bsam pas dgon
NK001(ka)032:321: par gom pa gcig bor ba bsod nams che /
NK001(ka)032:323: bsod nams can gyi rab byung du sgrub pa'i skabs 'dir barje ba rnam pa gsum bya ste /
NK001(ka)032:328: khyim pa'i rtags cha lugs rnams spangs shing /
NK001(ka)032:331: snod spyad kyi rtags gsum gyi sgo nas rab tu
NK001(ka)032:332: byung ba'i rtags cha lugs su bsgrub pa zhig dgos
NK001(ka)032:333: de tshang / ming barje ba ni /
NK001(ka)032:334: }na gyi mkhan po'i ming gi mtha' can /
NK001(ka)032:339: da ltar gyi mkhan po'i ming gi mtha' can gang rung du spo dgos pas /
NK001(ka)032:340: khyod kyi ming 'di zhes bya ba gyis shig /
NK001(ka)032:341: rtags dang ming barjesa pa'i dgos pa yang bsam pa barje ba yin pas /
NK001(ka)032:342: }ra phan chad tshe 'di'i bde 'byor snyan grags sogs bsgrub byar byed pa de spangs nas /
NK001(ka)032:343: . phyin chad skye ba phyi ma phan chad kyi don sgrub pa gal che ste /
NK001(ka)032:344: de'i rgyu mtshan 'khor ba 'dir lha mi'i lus thob
NK001(ka)032:345: kyang sdug basngala las ma 'das pas 'khor ba rgyu
NK001(ka)032:347: rnam grol gtan gyi bde ba sgrub /
NK001(ka)032:348: . yang rang gcig pu'i don du ma yin /
NK001(ka)032:349: sems can thams cad kyi don du rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob par bya /
NK001(ka)032:350: de'i thabs su 'o skol gyi ston pas rgyal srid
NK001(ka)032:351: kyi 'byor pa'ng mchil ma'i thal ba ltar bor nas
NK001(ka)032:352: rab tu byung ba bzhin du bdag kyang de'i rnam
NK001(ka)032:353: thar gyi rjes su zhugs te rab tu 'byung ba
NK001(ka)032:354: yin pas / 'khor pa las skyob pa'i skyabs dkon
NK001(ka)032:355: mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'i sgo nas rab
NK001(ka)032:356: tu byung ba'i rtags cha lugs yang dag par blangs
NK001(ka)032:357: te ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsrung snyam pas rjes
NK001(ka)032:358: yin pas / zlos gyis / mkhan po dgongs su gsol /
NK001(ka)032:359: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung ste /
NK001(ka)032:360: ji srid 'tsho'i bar du rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog /
NK001(ka)032:361: sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o //
NK001(ka)032:362: 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi chos la tshogs
NK001(ka)032:363: rnams kyi dge 'dun bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
NK001(ka)032:364: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
NK001(ka)032:367: sh+aakya'i rgyal po gtso bo de rab tu byung ba'i rjes su bdag rab tu 'byung ste /
NK001(ka)032:369: rab tu byung ba'i rtags yang dag par len to //
NK001(ka)032:370: zhes lan gsum bzlas pa'i mthar thabs legs bya'o //
NK001(ka)032:371: rab byung 'di bar ma dge ba tsam las sdom
NK001(ka)032:372: pa dngos ma yin pas skye ba'i bar chad can
NK001(ka)032:373: la'ng skye zhing / dge bsnyen dang dge tshul gyi
NK001(ka)032:374: sdom pa sogs mi len par 'di rkyang pa byin
NK001(ka)032:376: . nas mkhan pos dge slong dge tshul gyi cho
NK001(ka)032:377: ga la mkhas pa sogs chos bcu ldan zhig la
NK001(ka)032:378: / dge slong che ge mos tshe dang ldan pa 'di dge tshul nyid du nye bar sgrubs shig /
NK001(ka)032:380: .sa ci tshe dang ldan pa 'di'i bar chad kyi chos rnams yongs su dag gam /
NK001(ka)032:383: yongs su dag go zhes kho na nyid mchi yin gda' /
NK001(ka)032:385: . nas slob dpon gyis bsgrub bya de ston pa
NK001(ka)032:386: dang rang la phyag gsum gsum 'tshal du bcug nas
NK001(ka)032:387: / mdun du tsog tsog por thal sbyar gyis 'dug tu bcug ste /
NK001(ka)032:388: khyod dge tshul du sgrub par byed pa la /
NK001(ka)032:392: . yan chad kyis sbyor ba'i chos rnams song nas /
NK001(ka)032:394: . yang 'gal rkyen med cing mthun rkyen tshang ba las skye bas na /
NK001(ka)032:395: 'gal rkyen sdom pa skye ba dang /
NK001(ka)032:398: mdzes pa la bar du gcod pa ste bzhi med pa zhig dgos te /
NK001(ka)032:399: }ra mkhan pos dris shing khyed rang gis lan btab
NK001(ka)032:400: pa'i sgo nas bar chad dang mi ldan par rtogs
NK001(ka)032:401: pa de yin / mthun rkyen la lnga las /
NK001(ka)032:402: yul mthun pa'i rkyen la skyabs 'gro'i yul du gyur pa'i dkon mchog gsum /
NK001(ka)032:404: sangs rgyas dge 'dun byed pa'i chos //
NK001(ka)032:405: mi slob pa dang gnyis ka dang //
NK001(ka)032:407: zhes gsungs pa ltar 'gogs lam gyi steng nas 'jog pas /
NK001(ka)032:408: de la yid ches kyi dad pa dang ldan pa'i sgo nas /
NK001(ka)032:409: . mtshon byed sangs rgyas ston pa'i sku gzugs dang /
NK001(ka)032:410: chos spyir sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa gnas shing /
NK001(ka)032:411: khyad par 'dul ba'i bslab pa la nan tan du byed pa dang /
NK001(ka)032:412: las kyi cho ga yod pa dgos de tshang /
NK001(ka)032:413: dge tshul gyi sdom pa gang zag las skye bas
NK001(ka)032:414: med ka med kyi yan lag ma yin kyang ngo
NK001(ka)032:415: tsha khrel yod kyi rten du dge 'dun dang bcas
NK001(ka)032:416: pa bzhugs / mkhan po brtan mkhas kyi yon tan
NK001(ka)032:417: phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa la gsol ba
NK001(ka)032:418: btab cing zhal gyis bzhes pa zhig dgos na de
NK001(ka)032:419: pa bzhugs / yang tshang / slob dpon bsnyen rdzogs
NK001(ka)032:420: kyi sdom pa dang ldan cing dge tshul gyi sdom
NK001(ka)032:421: pa 'bogs pa'i cho ga brda sprod pa la mkhas
NK001(ka)032:423: . bdag gis sgrub pas yul du gang dgos thams cad tshang /
NK001(ka)032:424: rgyud snod du rung ba mthun pa'i rkyen yang /
NK001(ka)032:425: bsgrub bya bzhir ma longs shing /
NK001(ka)032:426: dge tshul gyi sdon pa dang sdom ros rgyud ma bkag pa /
NK001(ka)032:427: nyes med kyi sdom pa skye ba la tshigs snga
NK001(ka)032:428: ma dge bsnyen sogs thob cing ma nyams pa dgos
NK001(ka)032:431: lus byi byad dang gos dang snod spyad gsum gyi
NK001(ka)032:432: sgo nas rab tu byung ba'i rtags cha lugs dang
NK001(ka)032:433: ldan pa zhig dgos na brnyan po-tshun chad kyi thams
NK001(ka)032:434: cad tshang / bsam pa mthun pa'i rkyen la /
NK001(ka)032:435: rgyu'i kun slong zhe thag pa nas sdom pa len 'dod dgos te /
NK001(ka)032:436: khyed rang gis don du gnyer nas sgrub pas tshang zhing /
NK001(ka)032:437: dus kyi kun slong sdom pa thob dus thob shes kyi bsam pa skye rung zhig dgos te /
NK001(ka)032:438: . yang khyod la skye rung du yod cing /
NK001(ka)032:439: nge. kyis kyang brda sprod pa yin /
NK001(ka)032:440: 'gal rkyen nges pa lnga bral cha 'dra zhig dgos te /
NK001(ka)032:441: sems can che ge mo zhig la spong zhes pa lta bu sems can nges pa dang /
NK001(ka)032:442: yul ga ge mo zhig tu bsrung zhes pa lta bu yul nges pa dang /
NK001(ka)032:443: zla ba gcig gam lo gcig gi bar du bsrung zhes pa lta bu dus nges pa dang /
NK001(ka)032:444: 'thab rtsod kyi tshe ma gtogs bsrung zhes pa lta bu tshe nges pa dang /
NK001(ka)032:445: spang bya bcu'i nang nas 'di bsrung 'di mi bsrung zhes pa lta bu yan lag nges pa ste /
NK001(ka)032:446: nges pa de rnams dang bral ba zhig dgos /
NK001(ka)032:447: . thams cad myang 'das kyi bsam pas zin pa zhig dgos te /
NK001(ka)032:448: tshe 'di'i sdug basngala dang bral 'dod dam /
NK001(ka)032:449: phyi ma ngan song gi sdug basngala las skyob pa'i
NK001(ka)032:450: ched du len pa 'jigs skyob kyi tshul khrims dang
NK001(ka)032:452: phyi mar lha mi'i bde 'bras 'dod nas len pa legs smon gyi tshul khrims tsam las /
NK001(ka)032:453: . gnyis so thar gyi sdom pa mi 'gyur te /
NK001(ka)032:454: so so thar pa'i sdom pa 'di ni nges par
NK001(ka)032:455: 'byung ba'i tshul khrims yin pas sdug basngala can gyi
NK001(ka)032:456: 'khor ba las thar pa myang 'das thob pa'i ched
NK001(ka)032:457: du blang dgos / . yang thar pa'i mchog rdzogs
NK001(ka)032:458: pa'i sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang yin pas bsam pa
NK001(ka)032:460: khams gsum 'khor ba ni rgyu ba'i sems can 'di
NK001(ka)032:461: thams cad 'dod pa bde ba 'dod kyang thabs mi
NK001(ka)032:462: mkhas pas la la ni sdug basngala gyi rgyu mi
NK001(ka)032:463: dge ba rngams po che la spyo. /
NK001(ka)032:464: la la ni las ngan gyi 'bras bu sdug basngala
NK001(ka)032:465: dngos kyi yo lang la spyod pas nyam thag pa
NK001(ka)032:467: 'o na snying rje ba'i sar bzhag pas mi phan rnam grol gtan gyi bde ba la 'god dgos /
NK001(ka)032:468: de'i nus pa da lta bdag la mi 'dug pas
NK001(ka)032:469: 'gro kun sgrol nus pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
NK001(ka)032:471: de'i ched du bdag gis dge tshul gyi sdom pa
NK001(ka)032:472: blang snyam pa'i bsam pa dung dung ba bskyed 'tshal
NK001(ka)032:473: / cho ga mthun pa'i rkyen la sbyor ba sngar song /
NK001(ka)032:475: rjes de lta nyid du sgrub pas /
NK001(ka)032:476: dkon mchog gsum skyabs gnas su bzung nas dge tshul
NK001(ka)032:477: gyi sdom pa blangs te ji srid 'tsho'i bar du
NK001(ka)032:478: bsrung snyam pa gyis la rjes zlos gyis /
NK001(ka)032:480: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung ste /
NK001(ka)032:481: ji srid 'tsho'i bar du rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog /
NK001(ka)032:482: sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o //
NK001(ka)032:483: 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi mchog /
NK001(ka)032:487: bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dge tshul du /
NK001(ka)032:490: lan gsum pa 'di la skyabs barjoda dang bdag barjo.
NK001(ka)032:491: gnyis rdzogs mtshams gzhan barjoda kyi thog mar bdag gis
NK001(ka)032:492: se gol gyi brda byas pa dang mnyam du sdom
NK001(ka)032:494: dus der sdom pa thob snyam pa dang /
NK001(ka)032:495: . nas nged la'ng slob dpon zhes barjoda dgos pa /
NK001(ka)032:496: . yid la zhog la rjes zlos gyis /
NK001(ka)032:499: .sa dngos gzhi grub nas mjug gi cho ga la gnyis yod pa'i /
NK001(ka)032:500: dang po thob pa'i dus go ba de dge slong che ge mos mdzod cig /
NK001(ka)032:502: .sa kyang nyi ma rdzogs pa'i sar phyin te grib tshod gzhal /
NK001(ka)032:503: dus tshod dang nyin mtshan gyi cha rnams nges par byas nas /
NK001(ka)032:504: khyod dge tshul du sgrub pa'i cho ga la sbyor dngos rjes gsum yod pa'i /
NK001(ka)032:505: sbyor dngos gnyis kyis khyod kyi rgyud la dge tshul gyi sdom pa thob pa yin /
NK001(ka)032:506: da mjug cho ga la gnyis yod pa'i /
NK001(ka)032:507: dang po bsnyen bkur gyi gnas dang gnas ma yin
NK001(ka)032:508: pa shes pa'i phyir thob pa'i dus go ba'i dbang
NK001(ka)032:509: du byas na / lung dang karma sha tam dang /
NK001(ka)032:510: mdo rtsa ba rnams su phra rim nas gsungs kyang /
NK001(ka)032:511: gzhi 'brel mkhan pos phra rim nas btsal nas rags rim nas barjoda par gsungs shing /
NK001(ka)032:512: lo tshigs shes pa'i phyir lo yang barjoda dgos par gsungs pa dang bstun na /
NK001(ka)032:513: da lo'i lo 'di- che ge'i lo yin /
NK001(ka)032:514: de la lo 'go 'dzin lugs mi 'dra ba mang yang karma sha tam las /
NK001(ka)032:517: zhes sogs gsungs shing de yang hor zla dang sbyar na /
NK001(ka)032:519: bdag gi rgyu skar smin drug barjo. //
NK001(ka)032:520: zla ba nya tshe zla rangs 'gyur //
NK001(ka)032:521: ston zla tha chung zhes bya ba //
NK001(ka)032:522: 'dir ni rab tu barjoda pa yin //
NK001(ka)032:523: zhes gsungs pas smin drug zla ba'i phyed snga mas ston zla tha chung rdzogs nas /
NK001(ka)032:524: de'i phyed phyi ma nas lo 'go 'dzin pa'i dbang du byas te /
NK001(ka)032:526: dpyid kyi dus zla ba bzhi /
NK001(ka)032:527: dbyar gyi dus zla ba gcig /
NK001(ka)032:528: dbyar thung ngu nyin zhag gcig /
NK001(ka)032:529: dbyar ring po gsum du zhag gcig gis ma tshang ba rnams su yod pa las che ge yin /
NK001(ka)032:530: zla ba la'ng yar ngo mar ngo gnyis las che ge yin /
NK001(ka)032:531: de la'ng yar ngo'i gral tshes bco lnga dang /
NK001(ka)032:532: mar ngo'i bco lnga'am bcu bzhi las che ge yin /
NK001(ka)032:533: de la nyin mtshan gyi cha nyi shu rtsa gnyis yod de /
NK001(ka)032:537: mtshan mo'i thun dang po dang /
NK001(ka)032:543: skya rengs ma shar ba dang /
NK001(ka)032:545: nyi ma ma shar ba dang /
NK001(ka)032:547: nyi ma brgyad cha shar ba dang /
NK001(ka)032:548: nyi ma bzhi cha shar ba dang /
NK001(ka)032:549: gung tshigs ma yol ba dang /
NK001(ka)032:550: nyi ma bzhi cha lus pa dang /
NK001(ka)032:551: nyi ma brgyad cha lus pa dang /
NK001(ka)032:552: nyi ma ma nub pa dang /
NK001(ka)032:554: rgyu skar rnams ma shar ba dang /
NK001(ka)032:555: rgyu skar rnams shar ba ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis las /
NK001(ka)032:558: grib tshod skyes bu che ge dang /
NK001(ka)032:559: rkang pa che ge'i- dus su /
NK001(ka)032:560: bkra shis pa'i gtsug lag khang ngam gnas 'di zhes bya bar /
NK001(ka)032:562: slob dpon che ge las dge tshul gyi sdom pa thob pa yin pas /
NK001(ka)032:566: dge tshul rang bas bslab pa rgan pa rnams yin /
NK001(ka)032:568: dge tshul rang bas bslab pa gzhon pa rnams dang /
NK001(ka)032:569: rten dman pa dge slong ma sogs bud med rab tu byung ba thams cad dang /
NK001(ka)032:570: dge bsnyen man chad khyim pa thams cad yin /
NK001(ka)032:571: . yang rgan gzhon gyi khyad par rags pa lo zla 'jog par ma zad /
NK001(ka)032:572: tha na grib ma sor gcig yan chad kyis kyang 'jog pas /
NK001(ka)032:574: bsnyen bkur gyi gnas rnams gral gong du zhogs /
NK001(ka)032:577: }na la ldang ba sogs gus pa'i las rnams yar stobs /
NK001(ka)032:578: gnas ma yin pa rnams rang gi gral 'og tu zhogs /
NK001(ka)032:579: phyag dang bsnyen bkur stob pa byung na dang du long /
NK001(ka)032:580: 'on kyang dge slob ma dang dge slong ma gnyis
NK001(ka)032:581: bslab tshigs mtho bas de gnyis kyi phyag ma len
NK001(ka)032:582: / . ltar brtsis pas dge tshul nang dus mnyam
NK001(ka)032:583: pa byung na gcig gis gcig la phyag bya mi
NK001(ka)032:584: / dgos shing / gral yang mgyogs gral du byas pas chog /
NK001(ka)032:585: . ltar byas pas gnas skabs su sdom pa thob
NK001(ka)032:586: pa'i dus shes shing rgan pa la bsnyen bkur bas
NK001(ka)032:587: gzhan rgyud kyi bslab pa la gus pa dang /
NK001(ka)032:588: gzhon pa'i bsnyen bkur dang du blangs pas rang rgyud kyi bslab pa la gus pa dang /
NK001(ka)032:591: ya rabs kyi lugs dang mthun /
NK001(ka)032:592: mthar thug ston pa'i bcas pa bzhin du bslab pas /
NK001(ka)032:593: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa sangs rgyas thob pa'i dgos pa yod pas /
NK001(ka)032:594: . rnams thugs la bzhag nas phyag len la thebs pa mdzo. /
NK001(ka)032:596: gnyis pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen pas gsungs par 'gyur bas de la gsan pas mchi bar gda' /
NK001(ka)032:598: dge ba'i bshes gnyen pas gsungs pa de rnams kyang
NK001(ka)032:599: sems la gzhag nas lag len la thebs pa bya
NK001(ka)032:600: dgos / da mjug chog gnyis pa mi nyams shing
NK001(ka)032:601: 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir bslab pa barjoda pa ni
NK001(ka)032:602: dgos / / sdom pa thob pa tsam gyis mi chog gces spras kyi sgo nas bsrung dgos /
NK001(ka)032:603: bsrung lugs bslab bya bcu po 'khor dang bcas pa
NK001(ka)032:604: 'phags pa dgra bcom pa rnams kyi ji ltar bsrungs
NK001(ka)032:605: pa bzhin du bdag gis kyang bsrung snyam pas rjes
NK001(ka)032:606: zlos gyis / slob dpon dgongs su gsol /
NK001(ka)032:607: ji ltar 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag gis
NK001(ka)032:608: ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spangs te
NK001(ka)032:609: srog gcod pa las slar log pa de bzhin du
NK001(ka)032:610: / bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas kyang /
NK001(ka)032:611: dus 'di nas bzung ste ji srid 'tsho'i bar du
NK001(ka)032:612: srog gcod pa spangs te srog gcod pa las slar
NK001(ka)032:613: ldog par bagyi'o // yan lag dang po 'dis bdag
NK001(ka)032:614: 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag gi bslab pa
NK001(ka)032:618: gzhan yang ji ltar 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de
NK001(ka)032:619: dag gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du ma byin par
NK001(ka)032:620: len pa dang / mi tshangs par spyod pa dang /
NK001(ka)032:623: bcos pa'i chang myos par 'gyur ba /
NK001(ka)032:633: dus ma yin pa'i kha zas dang /
NK001(ka)032:634: gser dngul len pa spangs te /
NK001(ka)032:635: gser dngul len pa las slar log pa de bzhin du /
NK001(ka)032:636: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas kyang /
NK001(ka)032:637: dus 'di nas bzung ste ji srid 'tsho'i bar du ma byin par len pa dang /
NK001(ka)032:638: mi tshangs par spyod pa dang /
NK001(ka)032:641: bcos pa'i chang myos par 'gyur ba /
NK001(ka)032:651: dus ma yin pa'i kha zas dang /
NK001(ka)032:652: gser dngul len pa spangs te /
NK001(ka)032:653: gser dngul len pa las slar ldog par bagyi'o //
NK001(ka)032:654: yan lag bcu pa 'dis bdag 'phags pa dgra bcom
NK001(ka)032:655: pa de dag gis bslab pa la rjes su slob
NK001(ka)032:658: zhes lan gcig gi rjes su thabs legs bya'o //
NK001(ka)032:659: . rnams bslab bya barjoda pa yin pas ji ltar khas blangs pa bzhin legs par srungs shig /
NK001(ka)032:660: . ltar dge tshul du gyur nas khyim pa thams
NK001(ka)032:661: cad kyis phyag bya ba'i gnas thob pa yin te
NK001(ka)032:663: . ltar dge tshul byas ma thag /
NK001(ka)032:664: 'di la khyim pa thams cad kyis //
NK001(ka)032:666: gang phyir khyim gyi 'ching grol phyir //
NK001(ka)032:667: zhes gsungs pa ltar phan yon chen po mnga' bas dga' ba sgoms /
NK001(ka)032:668: . mkhan po'i sku drin yin pas btang rag gi
NK001(ka)032:669: phyag gsum 'tshol la bka' drin che lags zhes barjoda
NK001(ka)032:670: cig / me tog 'thor bzhin du thams cad kyis smon lam rnam bzhi gdab bo //
NK001(ka)032:671: dge tshul du sgrub pa'i cho ga'o //
NK001(ka)032:672: gnyis pa tshigs phyi ma bsnyen rdzogs su sgrub pa'i cho ga ni /
NK001(ka)032:673: bsgrub bya de lo nyi shu lon zhing bsnyen rdzogs 'dod na /
NK001(ka)032:674: ston pa'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar mchod pa bsham /
NK001(ka)032:675: chos gos sogs yo byad rnams brnyan po tshun chad kyis btsal la /
NK001(ka)032:676: chos gos rnams byi nang mgo mjug ma log par bzhi ltab tu byas te brkyang pa dang /
NK001(ka)032:679: chu tshags rnams mkhan po dang nye bar bzhag /
NK001(ka)032:681: stan gyi r+ts+wa pha gu dang bcas pa sta gon bya /
NK001(ka)032:682: las kyi gnas der 'du ba'i dge slong thams cad kyi rang rgyud la brtags te /
NK001(ka)032:683: ltung ba yod na bshags bsdam byin gyi rlob pa
NK001(ka)032:684: sogs gang la gang 'os kyis phyir bcos pas rgyud
NK001(ka)032:685: dag bar byas te- las gral du 'dus pa dang
NK001(ka)032:686: / bsgrub bya de pha gu'i steng du r+ts+wa bting
NK001(ka)032:687: ba la bzhag mkhan po nyid du phyogs pa des
NK001(ka)032:688: dge 'dun thams cad la me tog phul nas 'grengs
NK001(ka)032:690: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
NK001(ka)032:691: tshe dang ldan pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di /
NK001(ka)032:692: dge 'dun las bsnyen par rdzogs par 'tshal nas /
NK001(ka)032:693: dge 'dun las bsnyen par rdzogs par gsol na /
NK001(ka)032:694: dge slong dge ba'i bshes gnyen che ge mos las kyi slob dpon bkas gnang ba zhu /
NK001(ka)032:695: dge slong che ge mos gsang ste ston pa'i slob dpon bkas gnang zhu /
NK001(ka)032:696: dge slong che ge mos dbu mdzad pa rnams kyis las kyi kha skong bar mdzad nas /
NK001(ka)032:697: tshe dang ldan pa 'di la bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i sdom pa bkas gnang ba zhu /
NK001(ka)032:698: dngos de ltar g.yar ngo 'phyar zhing mchis lags /
NK001(ka)032:700: 'di las gral du 'dus nas mdzad pa phyag len te /
NK001(ka)032:701: bstan pa'i rnam bzhag ma nyams tsam yin gyi /
NK001(ka)032:702: gzhung gi 'gros dang bstun na las gral du ma
NK001(ka)032:703: 'dus gong du tshig gis gsol ba btab pas chog
NK001(ka)032:704: par gsungs so // . nas bsgrub bya la /
NK001(ka)032:705: ston pa'i-sku gzugs 'di la ston pa dngos kyi 'du
NK001(ka)032:706: shes zhog la phyag gsum gyis zhes 'tshal du gzhug
NK001(ka)032:707: / rang nyid dge 'dun gyi nang du 'jug pa'i
NK001(ka)032:708: don du dge slong re re la phyag gsum gsum
NK001(ka)032:709: / gyis / zhes yan lag lnga sa la gtugs
NK001(ka)032:710: pa'am sgyid pa la 'khyud de mgo bos rkang pa
NK001(ka)032:711: la gtugs pa'i phyag gnyis gang yang rung pa 'tshal
NK001(ka)032:712: / gyis / du gzhug cing / phyag 'tshal ba'i tshe dge slong re res kyang /
NK001(ka)032:713: bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi sdom pa myur du thob par gyur cig /
NK001(ka)032:714: ces smon lam gdab cing me tog 'thor ro //
NK001(ka)032:715: . nas bsgrub bya de r+ts+wa'i steng nas mkhan po la phyag gsum 'tshal du bcug nas /
NK001(ka)032:716: pha gu'i steng du r+ts+wa bting ba la rting ba
NK001(ka)032:717: gnyis kyis mnan nas tsog tsog pos snying gar thal
NK001(ka)032:719: khyod sngon gyi dge ba dang smon lam gyi dbang
NK001(ka)032:720: gis rten phun sum tshogs pa mi lus rin po
NK001(ka)032:721: che thob cing / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la rim gyis bslabs te /
NK001(ka)032:722: bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi sdom pa nod par 'dod pa de shin tu legs /
NK001(ka)032:724: da res khams gsum 'khor ba sdug basngala gyi rang
NK001(ka)032:725: bzhin can 'di las thar ba rnam grol gtan gyi
NK001(ka)032:726: bde ba thob pa'i ched du rgyal ba'i bstan pa
NK001(ka)032:728: bstan pa'i snying po sde snod gsum gyi nyams su
NK001(ka)032:729: blang bya bslab pa rin po che rnam pa gsum
NK001(ka)032:730: yin / . yang 'khor ba dngos kyi gnyen po
NK001(ka)032:731: rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes rab ni lam gyi
NK001(ka)032:733: de'i rgyu yang dmigs pa la rtse gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin dgos la /
NK001(ka)032:734: . yang 'gyod pa med pa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa las 'grub cing /
NK001(ka)032:735: tshul khrims kyang 'dir so so thar pa'i sdom pa
NK001(ka)032:736: rigs brgyad las mchog tu gyur pa dge slong gi-sdom
NK001(ka)032:738: sangs rgyas bstan pa rin chen sgron //
NK001(ka)032:739: 'bar ba'i snod ni dka' thub can //
NK001(ka)032:741: dge slong rnams ni yin phyir ro //
NK001(ka)032:743: . lta bu'i phan yon can gyi bsnyen rdzogs su sgrub pa'i tshul yang /
NK001(ka)032:744: }na ston pa rdzogs sangs rgyas nas ring po ma
NK001(ka)032:745: lon pa'i dus kyi gdul bya rnams ni nyon mongs
NK001(ka)032:746: pa dang / rnam par smin pa dang /
NK001(ka)032:747: las kyi sgrib pa gsum shas chung zhing /
NK001(ka)032:750: dge ba'i rtsa ba smin pa shas che bas 'khrig
NK001(ka)032:751: cing skyong bar byed pa la ltos mi dgos pa'i
NK001(ka)032:752: phyir tshul shog la sogs pa thabs sla ba mang
NK001(ka)032:753: po dang / mkhan slob med par dge 'dun gyis
NK001(ka)032:754: gsol bzhi'i las kyis rab byung bsnyen rdzogs gcig car
NK001(ka)032:755: du sgrub pa sogs sngon gyi cho ga rnams gsungs
NK001(ka)032:756: po dang / mod kyi / dus phyis sems can
NK001(ka)032:757: smin shas chung zhing sgrib gsum shas che bas kun
NK001(ka)032:758: tu-spyod pa'i khyad par mi shes pa slob dgos par
NK001(ka)032:759: po dang / mod kyi / 'gyur zhing / lus
NK001(ka)032:760: kyi 'byung ba cha ma snyoms pas na bar gyur
NK001(ka)032:761: pa dag la nad g.yogs dgos pa sogs 'khrid cing
NK001(ka)032:762: skyong ba la ltos pa'i phyir tshegs dang bcas pa
NK001(ka)032:763: da ltar gyi cho ga'i- sgo nas bsnyen par rdzogs
NK001(ka)032:764: po dang / mod kyi / 'gyur zhing / pa
NK001(ka)032:765: sgrub 'tshal / de la'ng cho ga sbyor dngos rjes
NK001(ka)032:766: gsum gyi sbyor ba la'ng drug las /
NK001(ka)032:767: yo byad tshags su gzhug cing dkon mchog gsum dang
NK001(ka)032:768: slob dpon mngon du 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir dang
NK001(ka)032:770: da mkhan po mngon du 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir /
NK001(ka)032:771: sbyor chog gnyis pa mkhan por gsol ba 'debs pa'i skabs yin /
NK001(ka)032:773: nye bsgyur u pa sngon ma'i /
NK001(ka)032:776: bi k+aa ra na zhes pas /
NK001(ka)032:779: nye bar lung 'bogs pa'i don te /
NK001(ka)032:780: brtse bas 'khor bar ltung ba las nye bar bzung nas /
NK001(ka)032:781: bslab pa rin po che la nye bar sbyar te /
NK001(ka)032:782: 'jug ldog gi bslab bya dag nye bar lung 'bogs par byed pas na mkhan po zhes bya /
NK001(ka)032:783: . yang btsun pa brtan pa'i yan lag tu bsnyen
NK001(ka)032:784: par rdzogs nas lo bcu bar ma chad du lon
NK001(ka)032:785: pa dang / mkhas shing phan thogs pa'i yan lag
NK001(ka)032:786: tu lnga phrugs nyi shu rtsa gcig las gang rung
NK001(ka)032:788: brtan mkhas kyi yon tan gnyis dang ldan pa zhig dgos pa kho bos 'grub rung du yod pas /
NK001(ka)032:789: btsun pa'am sngar gyi mkhan slob yin na dge tshul gyi slob dpon nam /
NK001(ka)032:790: rab byung gi mkhan po la da bsnyen rdzogs kyi
NK001(ka)032:791: mkhan po zhu snyam pa gyis la rjes zlos gyis
NK001(ka)032:792: / btsun pa'am slob dpon nam mkhan po dgongs su gsol /
NK001(ka)032:794: btsun pa'am slob dpon nam mkhan po la mkhan por gsol gyi /
NK001(ka)032:795: btsun pa'am slob dpon nam mkhan po /
NK001(ka)032:796: bdag gi mkhan po mdzad du gsol /
NK001(ka)032:797: btsun pa'am slob dpon nam mkhan pos bsnyen par rdzogs par bagyi'o //
NK001(ka)032:799: lan gsum pa'i cha gsum pa la gang yin kyang mkhan po mkhan pos zhes barjoda cing /
NK001(ka)032:801: . nas yo byad mngon du 'gyur bar bya ba'i
NK001(ka)032:802: phyir sbyor chog gsum pa rtags dang cha lugs sbyin
NK001(ka)032:803: pa yin pas phyag gsum 'tshol la nged kyi mdun
NK001(ka)032:805: grogs dan gyi chos gos gsum so sor bltab ste bsgrub bya'i phrag pa g.yon la bkal nas /
NK001(ka)032:807: 'di la rgyu'i byin rlabs 'chags par gda' zhes brda spra. /
NK001(ka)032:809: tshe dang ldan pa 'di'i lhung bzed dge 'dun la ston cig /
NK001(ka)032:811: . nas mkhan po dang bsgrub bya gnyis ka 'greng
NK001(ka)032:812: ste gnyis ka'i lag g.yon 'og dang g.yas steng du
NK001(ka)032:813: byas pas snam sbyar bzung nas /
NK001(ka)032:814: 'di snam phran dang glegs bu 'thud cing sbyar bas snam sbyar zhes bya ba /
NK001(ka)032:815: khyim pa dang mu stegs can dang rab tu byung
NK001(ka)032:816: yang bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dge tshul man chad
NK001(ka)032:817: las rtags khyad par du gyur /
NK001(ka)032:818: dge sbyong gi dran pa gsol /
NK001(ka)032:819: ngo tsha dang khrel yod kyi bsam pa khyad par can bskye. /
NK001(ka)032:820: lha dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du 'gyur pa'i phyir gnang bas /
NK001(ka)032:821: 'di dge slong gi 'tsho ba'i yo byad snam sbyar
NK001(ka)032:822: du byin gyis barlaba snyam pa gyis la rjes zlos
NK001(ka)032:823: gyis / mkhan po dgongs su gsol /
NK001(ka)032:824: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i chos gos bgyis lags pa /
NK001(ka)032:825: rung ba spyad par 'os pa 'di chos gos snam sbyar du byin gyis barlaba bo //
NK001(ka)032:827: thabs legs byas la phrag pa g.yas su spo ba 'og ma rnams la'ng 'gre /
NK001(ka)032:828: de bzhin du bla gos bzung nas /
NK001(ka)032:829: 'di stod du rgyun du gyon par byed pa'i zhes
NK001(ka)032:830: pa nas gos su gnang bas zhes pa'i bar rab
NK001(ka)032:832: 'di bla gos su byin gyis barlaba snyam pa gyis la rjes blos gyis bya /
NK001(ka)032:833: }ra gyi snam sbyar ces pa'i gnas su bla gos zhes 'don pa bsgyur /
NK001(ka)032:835: 'di smad kyi nang du gyon par byed pa'i nas /
NK001(ka)032:837: 'di mthang gos su byin gyis barlaba snyam pa gyis la rjes zlos gyis bya /
NK001(ka)032:838: snam sbyar zhes pa mthang gos zhes bsgyur /
NK001(ka)032:840: bla gos dang snam sbyar sbrags te mkhan pos bkon par bya zhing /
NK001(ka)032:841: thams cad kyis smon lam bzhi gdab /
NK001(ka)032:842: .sa kyang snam sbyar dang bcas pa nyid yin na
NK001(ka)032:843: r+ts+wa 'am gding pa'i steng nas bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i
NK001(ka)032:844: phyir 'dus pa'i dge 'dun la phyag gsum bya'o //
NK001(ka)032:845: gal te re zhig chos gos gsum dngos kyi byin rlabs 'chags pa med na /
NK001(ka)032:846: rgyu dang kha dog gis rung ba'i gos khru gang yan chad la rgyu'i byin rlabs bya ste /
NK001(ka)032:849: 'di snam sbyar rgyur byin gyis barlaba snyam pa gyis la rjes zlos gyis /
NK001(ka)032:851: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i chos gos 'di snam sbyar du byin gyis barlaba bo //
NK001(ka)032:852: 'tshal na snam phran dgu pa la sogs par bgyi ste /
NK001(ka)032:853: \gas bu phyed dang gsum pa la sogs par bagyi'o //
NK001(ka)032:862: yang na 'di la lhan thabs su glan no //
NK001(ka)032:863: rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du bgyis te /
NK001(ka)032:864: chos gos 'di ni rung ba spyad par 'os pa'o //
NK001(ka)032:865: lan gsum bzlas zhing thabs legs bya /
NK001(ka)032:866: gzhan gnyis kyang de dang 'dra ba las /
NK001(ka)032:867: snam sbyar zhes pa'i gnas su bla gos zhes dang /
NK001(ka)032:868: snam phran bdun par bgyi ste /
NK001(ka)032:869: \gas bu phyed dang gsum par bagyi'o //
NK001(ka)032:871: snam sbyar zhes pa mthang gos dang /
NK001(ka)032:872: snam phran lnga par bgyi ste /
NK001(ka)032:873: \gas bu phyed dang gnyis par bagyi'o //
NK001(ka)032:875: yang khyim pa'i gos la sogs pa'am chos gos su
NK001(ka)032:876: drubs zin na'ng tshad las che chung du gyur pa
NK001(ka)032:877: dang rgyu dang kha dog gis mi chung ba rnams
NK001(ka)032:878: la dngos dang rgyu'i byin rlabs mi 'chags pas rkyen
NK001(ka)032:879: dbang gis byin gyis brlabs te /
NK001(ka)032:881: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas gos 'di snam sbyang du byin gyis barlaba bo //
NK001(ka)032:882: lan gsum bzlas shing thabs legs bya /
NK001(ka)032:883: bla gos dang mthang gos la'ng 'don pa bsgyur /
NK001(ka)032:884: . nas ltung bzed ston par bsgos pa des /
NK001(ka)032:885: ltung bzed du sman nam me tog cung zad bcug la lag g.yon par bzhag /
NK001(ka)032:887: dge slong re re'i mdun du 'greng ste 'dud pa dang bcas pas /
NK001(ka)032:889: gzhon na tshe dang ldan pa dgos su gsol /
NK001(ka)032:890: tshe dang ldan pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i lhung bzed 'di mi chud dam /
NK001(ka)032:894: . lta bu ma yin na re re nas lhung bzed bzang ngo //
NK001(ka)032:896: ma barjoda na nyes byas so //
NK001(ka)032:897: . nas lhung bzed de mkhan po dang bsgrub bya gnyis ka 'greng ba'i lag g.yon par bzhag /
NK001(ka)032:901: zas lhung ba bzed pa'i don du gnang ba 'di
NK001(ka)032:902: dge slong gi 'tsho ba'i yo byad lhung bzed du
NK001(ka)032:903: byin gyis barlaba snyam pa gyis la rjes zlos gyis
NK001(ka)032:905: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i lhung bzed zas la
NK001(ka)032:906: spyad par 'os pa drang srong gi snod 'di bslang
NK001(ka)032:907: ba'i snod du byin gyis barlaba bo //
NK001(ka)032:911: 'di chos gos gding ba zhes bya ba nas /
NK001(ka)032:913: gding ba 'di lta bu byin gyis brlabs nas 'chang bar gyis shig /
NK001(ka)032:914: .sa mtshon nas gzhan gyi longs spyod gang la yang 'phangs med du spyod pa thams cad spang dgos /
NK001(ka)032:916: 'di chu tshags zhes bya ba yin te nas gnang
NK001(ka)032:917: ba yin pas chu tshags 'di lta bu byin gyis
NK001(ka)032:919: .sa mtshon nas yo byad gang la'ng sems can la mi gnod par bya dgos /
NK001(ka)032:920: .sa yo byad mngon du gyur pa byas zin pas /
NK001(ka)032:921: re zhig dge slong 'di'i phyi la song zhig /
NK001(ka)032:923: grogs byed pa'i dge slong des kyang bsgrub bya de
NK001(ka)032:924: las mi thos shing las grol nas mthong ba'i sar
NK001(ka)032:925: gding ba'i steng du tshogs la mngon du phyogs par
NK001(ka)032:926: 'greng ste thal sbyar gyis bzhag la /
NK001(ka)032:927: rang nyid las gral du 'khod do //
NK001(ka)032:928: . nas las slob tu mngon du phyogs pa'i dge slong des /
NK001(ka)032:929: gsang ston bsko ba'i thog mar yul dus kyi stobs
NK001(ka)032:930: kyis bshags par ma nus pa'i ltung ba thun mong
NK001(ka)032:931: ba rnams kyis las la mi sgrib par bya ba'i
NK001(ka)032:932: phyir / gsol ba'i las kyi byin gyis barlaba par bgyi bas /
NK001(ka)032:933: dge 'dun rnams spyod lam bstun nas gsol ba'i las la thugs gtad par zhu /
NK001(ka)032:934: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
NK001(ka)032:935: .nga dge 'dun gyi bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i phrin las lags la /
NK001(ka)032:936: bdag cag dge 'dun thams cad ni ltung ba dang bcas par gyur na /
NK001(ka)032:937: gang gi mdun du bdag cag ltung ba de chos bzhin du slar bgyi ba /
NK001(ka)032:938: bdag cag las dge slong gnas gzhan du mchis la /
NK001(ka)032:939: dge slong gi mdun du ltung ba de dag chos
NK001(ka)032:940: bzhin du slar bgyid par spro ba su yang ma
NK001(ka)032:941: mchis na / gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la
NK001(ka)032:942: bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod
NK001(ka)032:943: mchis na / cig dang / dge 'dun gyis deng
NK001(ka)032:944: ltung ba byin gyis brlabs te bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i
NK001(ka)032:946: slad kyis dge slong gi mdun du ltung ba de dag chos bzhin du slar mdzad do //
NK001(ka)032:948: . nas sngar gnas la blo mthun byas pa zhig pa'am /
NK001(ka)032:949: ma byas pa yin na 'di ltar bya ste /
NK001(ka)032:950: gnas la blo mthun bgyi bas /
NK001(ka)032:951: las mdzad pa'i- gnas 'di nye 'khor dang bcas pa
NK001(ka)032:952: tshun chad bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i phrin las kyi gnas
NK001(ka)032:953: su blo dang bstun pa gsol ba'i las la thugs
NK001(ka)032:954: gtad par zhu / dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
NK001(ka)032:957: lags pa nang mtshams phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang
NK001(ka)032:958: dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi bsnyen par rdzogs
NK001(ka)032:959: pa'i phrin las kyi gnas su blo mthun par bzhed
NK001(ka)032:960: na / gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na /
NK001(ka)032:961: dge 'dun gyi gnang bar mdzod cig dang /
NK001(ka)032:962: dge 'dun gyi gnas thams cad nas 'dom gang dang
NK001(ka)032:963: bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i
NK001(ka)032:964: phrin las kyi gnas su blo mthun par bagyi'o //
NK001(ka)032:966: barjoda pa mjug sdud dang bcas pa la thugs gtad par zhu /
NK001(ka)032:967: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
NK001(ka)032:968: gnas thams cad nas 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di
NK001(ka)032:969: dge 'dun gyi bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i phrin las kyi
NK001(ka)032:972: gnas thams cad nas 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di
NK001(ka)032:973: dge 'dun gyi bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i phrin las kyi
NK001(ka)032:974: gnas su blo mthun bar bgyi na /
NK001(ka)032:975: tshe dang ldan pa gang dag gnas thams cad nas
NK001(ka)032:976: 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi bsnyen
NK001(ka)032:977: par rdzogs pa'i phrin las kyi gnas su blo mthun
NK001(ka)032:978: par bgyi bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma
NK001(ka)032:979: gsungs shig / gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /
NK001(ka)032:980: dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas /
NK001(ka)032:981: dge 'dun gyis gnas thams cad nas 'dom gang dang
NK001(ka)032:982: bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i
NK001(ka)032:983: phrin las kyi gnas su blo mthun par bgyis lags
NK001(ka)032:984: te / 'di ltar cang mi gsungs pas de de bzhin du 'dzin to //
NK001(ka)032:986: brag gi bya skyibs lta bu rang grub /
NK001(ka)032:987: bgyis pa ni skyes bus byas la ma zin pa /
NK001(ka)032:988: lags pa ni zin pa ste tshags su tshud pa yin pas skabs su gang babs barjoda do //
NK001(ka)032:989: . nas las byed pas mkhan po ming 'di zhes
NK001(ka)032:990: bya bas ming 'di zhes bya ba'i gsang ste ston
NK001(ka)032:991: par gsol ba btab pa gang yin /
NK001(ka)032:993: .sa bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba lags /
NK001(ka)032:995: dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod mkhan po
NK001(ka)032:996: ming 'di zhes bya bas ming 'di zhes bya ba
NK001(ka)032:997: la gsang ste ston par spro'am /
NK001(ka)032:1000: khong spro bar gda' bas yongs su dag pa mngon
NK001(ka)032:1001: du 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir sbyor chog bzhi pa
NK001(ka)032:1002: lkog tu bar chad dri ba'i ched du gsang ste
NK001(ka)032:1003: ston pa bsko ba la thugs bstun pa gsol ba'i
NK001(ka)032:1004: las la thugs gtad par zhu /
NK001(ka)032:1005: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
NK001(ka)032:1006: dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di mkhan po
NK001(ka)032:1007: ming 'di zhes bgyi bas ming 'di zhes bgyi ba
NK001(ka)032:1008: la gsang ste ston par spro na /
NK001(ka)032:1009: gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na /
NK001(ka)032:1010: dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /
NK001(ka)032:1011: dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di mkhan po
NK001(ka)032:1012: ming 'di zhes bya bas ming 'di zhes bgyi ba
NK001(ka)032:1015: . nas gsang ston phyi rol du song ste /
NK001(ka)032:1016: bsgrub bya de rang la phyag gsum 'tshal du bcug nas /
NK001(ka)032:1017: mdun du tsog tsog por thal sbyar gyis 'dug tu bcug ste /
NK001(ka)032:1018: khyod bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa la /
NK001(ka)032:1019: 'gal rkyen bar chad kyi chos dang mi ldan pa zhig dgos /
NK001(ka)032:1020: bar chad yod med kho bos dris pa las rtogs pas /
NK001(ka)032:1021: dri ba 'di rnams la lan drang por thob cig /
NK001(ka)032:1022: tshe dang ldan pa khyod nyon cig /
NK001(ka)032:1023: 'di ni khyod kyi bden pa'i dus /
NK001(ka)032:1025: kho bos khyod la cung zad cig dri yi /
NK001(ka)032:1027: yin pa la yin zhes smros shig /
NK001(ka)032:1028: ma yin pa la ma yin zhes lan thob cig /
NK001(ka)032:1031: skyes pa'i dbang po dang ldan nam /
NK001(ka)032:1035: khyod kyi chos gos gsum dang lhung bzed tshang ngam /
NK001(ka)032:1037: khyod kyi pha ma gson nam /
NK001(ka)032:1045: rtsod pa can ma btsongs pa ma rgyal pos bkrabs
NK001(ka)032:1046: pa ma rgyal po la bsdigs pa ma rgyal po
NK001(ka)032:1047: la gnod pa'i las byed pa ma rgyal po la
NK001(ka)032:1048: gnod pa'i las byas sam byed du bcug pa ma
NK001(ka)032:1049: chom rkun par grags pa ma za ma ma ma
NK001(ka)032:1050: ning ma dge slong ma sun phyungs pa ma rku
NK001(ka)032:1051: thabs su gnas pa ma tha dad du gnas pa
NK001(ka)032:1052: ma gnas par mi bya ba ma mu stegs can
NK001(ka)032:1053: ma mu stegs can zhugs pa ma pha bsad pa
NK001(ka)032:1054: ma ma bsad pa ma dgra bcom pa bsad pa
NK001(ka)032:1055: ma dge 'dun gyi dbyen byas pa ma de bzhin
NK001(ka)032:1056: gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyungs pa ma
NK001(ka)032:1057: sprul pa ma dud 'gro ma yin nam zhes dri
NK001(ka)032:1060: khyod la la la'i bu lon mang yang rung nyung yang rung cung zad chags pa med dam /
NK001(ka)032:1062: khyod bsnyen par rdzogs nas 'jal nus sam /
NK001(ka)032:1064: khyod sngon rab tu byung ba ma yin nam /
NK001(ka)032:1066: khyod la pham par 'gyur ba bzhi las ltung ba
NK001(ka)032:1067: gang yang rung ba zhig byung ba ma yin nam
NK001(ka)032:1068: / khyod 'bab pa na bslab pa legs par phul lam /
NK001(ka)032:1073: ji ltar khyod da ltar rab tu byung ba yin nam /
NK001(ka)032:1075: khyod kyis tshangs par spyod pa legs par spyad dam /
NK001(ka)032:1078: .sa bdag gi ming 'di zhes bgyi ba lags /
NK001(ka)032:1079: khyod kyi mkhan po'i ming ci /
NK001(ka)032:1080: .na gyi slang du mtshan nas smos te bdag gis mkhan po'i ming 'di zhes bgyi ba lags /
NK001(ka)032:1082: tshe dang ldan pa khyod nyon cig /
NK001(ka)032:1083: mi rnams kyi lus la lus kyi nad rnams pa
NK001(ka)032:1084: 'di lta bu 'di dag 'byung ba 'di lta ste
NK001(ka)032:1117: yan lag tu zug pa dang /
NK001(ka)032:1127: rus pa la zug pa ste /
NK001(ka)032:1128: lus kyi nad 'di lta bu 'di dag las gang yang rung ba dang /
NK001(ka)032:1129: 'di lta bu gzhan dag kyang khyod kyi lus la med dam /
NK001(ka)032:1131: tshe dang ldan pa khyod nyon cig /
NK001(ka)032:1132: khyod la da lta ngas gang dris pa de nyid
NK001(ka)032:1133: dge 'dun gyi dbus su yang tshangs pa mtshungs par
NK001(ka)032:1134: spyod pa mkhas pa rnams khyod la 'dri yis /
NK001(ka)032:1135: .ra yang khyod kyis ma 'dzem par byos la /
NK001(ka)032:1136: yin pa la yin zhes smros shig /
NK001(ka)032:1137: ma yin pa la ma yin zhes lan thob cig /
NK001(ka)032:1138: khyod ma bos kyi bar du ma 'ong bar sdod cig /
NK001(ka)032:1139: ngas dge 'dun la zhus la 'ong gi zhes barjo. /
NK001(ka)032:1140: dge 'dun gyi nang du 'ongs te rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'greng ste 'dud pa dang bcas pas /
NK001(ka)032:1141: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
NK001(ka)032:1142: bdag gis mkhan po ming 'di zhes bgyi bas /
NK001(ka)032:1143: ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la bar chad kyi chos rnams gsang ste rjes su bstan na /
NK001(ka)032:1144: . yang bar chad kyi chos rnams yongs su dag go zhes kho na nyid- mchi na /
NK001(ka)032:1147: gal te yongs su dag na'o //
NK001(ka)032:1149: ma barjoda na nyes byas so //
NK001(ka)032:1151: dge 'dun gyis gnang gis shog cig /
NK001(ka)032:1153: nang du gding ba'i steng nas dge 'dun la 'jug yon gyi phyag gsum 'tshal du bcug ste /
NK001(ka)032:1156: bsgrub bya de ston pa dang /
NK001(ka)032:1158: rang la phyag gsum gsum 'tshal du bcug ste /
NK001(ka)032:1159: rang gi mdun du pha gu'i steng du r+ts+wa bting
NK001(ka)032:1160: ba la rting pa gnyis kyis mnan nas tsog tsog
NK001(ka)032:1161: por thal sbyar gyis 'dug tu bcug ste /
NK001(ka)032:1162: khyod bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod pa de dge 'dun gyi las kyis sgrub dgos /
NK001(ka)032:1163: de la 'di bsnyen rdzogs kyi sdom pa sbyin pa'i las yin pas /
NK001(ka)032:1164: sbyin las mtshan nyid pa thams cad la gsol ba gdab pa sngon du 'gro dgos par gsungs shing /
NK001(ka)032:1165: .ra ma zad bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi
NK001(ka)032:1166: sdom pa de mngon gyur bcu tshang ba las skye
NK001(ka)032:1167: bas / 'dir gsol ba mngon du 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir /
NK001(ka)032:1168: sbyor chog lnga pa gsol ba 'debs pa'i-{bas yin /
NK001(ka)032:1169: . yang mkhan pos ngo chen mdzad de /
NK001(ka)032:1170: las byed pa'i tshig gis thog drangs nas /
NK001(ka)032:1171: gang las sdom pa thob par 'gyur ba'i dge 'dun grangs tshang ba /
NK001(ka)032:1172: kha skong gi chos dang ldan pa /
NK001(ka)032:1173: mi mthun pa gnyis dang bral ba ste mtshan nyid gsum ldan la gsol ba 'debs /
NK001(ka)032:1174: de la cho ga'i tshig la zur lnga yod de /
NK001(ka)032:1175: nyes pa ma lus pa spangs shing yon tan mtha'
NK001(ka)032:1176: dag rdzogs pa'i rnam par grol ba la bsnyen pa
NK001(ka)032:1177: dge slong gi dngos por sgrub tu gsol /
NK001(ka)032:1178: 'khor ba'i gnas brgal dka' ba 'dam rdzab dang 'dra ba nas drang du gsol /
NK001(ka)032:1179: }ra ma thob pa'i sdom pa sbyin pa'i sgo nas
NK001(ka)032:1180: so so thar pa'i sdom pa mchog dang ldan par
NK001(ka)032:1181: bzung du gsol / de'i blang dor gyi thabs ma nor ba bstan du gsol /
NK001(ka)032:1182: rnyed pa dang bkur sti la mi gzigs par thugs
NK001(ka)032:1183: brtse bas kun nas bslangs te bsnyen par rdzogs pa
NK001(ka)032:1184: dge slong gi sdom pa gnang bar mdzad du gsol
NK001(ka)032:1185: snyam pas thams cad kyis gsan pa'i rjes zlos gsal
NK001(ka)032:1187: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
NK001(ka)032:1189: .na gyi slad du mtshan nas smos te mkhan po
NK001(ka)032:1190: ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dge 'dun las bsnyen par
NK001(ka)032:1193: .na gyi slad du mtshan nas smos te mkhan po
NK001(ka)032:1194: ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dge 'dun las bsnyen par
NK001(ka)032:1196: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis bdag bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad du gsol /
NK001(ka)032:1197: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis bdag drang du gsol /
NK001(ka)032:1198: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis bdag rjes su bzung du gsol /
NK001(ka)032:1199: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis bdag la rjes su bstan du gsol /
NK001(ka)032:1200: thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis
NK001(ka)032:1201: thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag la thugs brtse bar
NK001(ka)032:1202: mdzad du gsol / zhes lan gsum bzlas /
NK001(ka)032:1204: dge 'dun gyis kyang cang mi gsung ba'i sgo nas gnang ba byin pa yin no //
NK001(ka)032:1205: . nas dge slong las byed pas /
NK001(ka)032:1206: yongs su dag par dge 'dun thugs ches pa'i phyir
NK001(ka)032:1207: sbyor chog drug pa nang du bar chad dri ba'i
NK001(ka)032:1208: thog mar sngon 'gro gsol ba'i las bgyid pas /
NK001(ka)032:1209: khyed rang rjes zlos bya mi dgos /
NK001(ka)032:1210: dge 'dun rnams spyod lam bstun nas gsol ba'i las la thugs gtad par zhu /
NK001(ka)032:1211: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
NK001(ka)032:1212: ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di mkhan po ming 'di
NK001(ka)032:1213: zhes bgyi bas dge 'dun las bsnyen par rdzogs par
NK001(ka)032:1214: tshal te / ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di mkhan
NK001(ka)032:1215: po ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dge 'dun las bsnyen
NK001(ka)032:1217: gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na /
NK001(ka)032:1218: dge 'dun gyi gnang bar mdzod cig dang /
NK001(ka)032:1219: bdag gis dge 'dun gyi nang du mkhan po ming
NK001(ka)032:1220: 'di zhes bgyi bas ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la
NK001(ka)032:1221: bar chad kyi chos rnams dri bar bya'o //
NK001(ka)032:1223: . nas bsgrub bya de rang la phyag gsum 'tshal du bcug ste sngar bzhin 'dug tu bcug la /
NK001(ka)032:1224: khyod bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa la 'gal rkyen
NK001(ka)032:1225: bar chad kyi chos dang mi ldan pa zhig dgos
NK001(ka)032:1226: / bar chad yod med brtags pa'i ched du sngar
NK001(ka)032:1227: gsang ston gyis lkog tu dris shing dge 'dun gyi
NK001(ka)032:1228: dbus su bar chad dang mi ldan par brda sprad
NK001(ka)032:1230: 'on kyang bar chad glo bur ba yin pas gsar du byung ba'ng sri. /
NK001(ka)032:1231: }ra ma dran pa dran pa'ng srid pa dang /
NK001(ka)032:1232: gtso bor dge 'dun thugs ches pa la sogs te
NK001(ka)032:1233: dgos pa 'ga' zhig la ltos nas 'dir yang 'dri
NK001(ka)032:1234: ba yin pas lan drang por thob cig /
NK001(ka)032:1235: tshe dang ldan pa khyod nyon cig /
NK001(ka)032:1236: 'di ni khyod kyi bden pa'i dus /
NK001(ka)032:1239: 'di lta bu gzhan dag kyang khyod kyi lus la med dam /
NK001(ka)032:1240: zhes pa'i bar sngar bzhin dri bar bya'o //
NK001(ka)032:1241: . yan chad kyis sbyor ba'i chos rnams legs par song nas /
NK001(ka)032:1242: da 'dir dngos gzhi'i cho ga'i skabs yin /
NK001(ka)032:1243: de la bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i sdom pa 'di chos nyid kyis thob pa ma yin zhing /
NK001(ka)032:1244: yang dag par blangs par brda las byung ba yin
NK001(ka)032:1245: pas cho ga phun sum tshogs pa la brten nas
NK001(ka)032:1246: blang dgos / . yang lung gcig las 'phros pa bcu pa'i skabs las /
NK001(ka)032:1247: mngon du gyur pa rnam pa bcu las skye bar gsungs te /
NK001(ka)032:1249: sangs rgyas chos dang ston pa dang //
NK001(ka)032:1250: mkhan po slob dpon bsnyen rdzogs 'dod //
NK001(ka)032:1251: yo byad yongs su dag pa dang //
NK001(ka)032:1252: gsol dang las ni mngon sum mo //
NK001(ka)032:1253: zhes bsdus pa'i don 'gal rkyen spangs shing mthun rkyen
NK001(ka)032:1254: tshang ba la 'du yang re re nas brda sprod
NK001(ka)032:1256: .na dam pa'i dkon mchog gsum ni /
NK001(ka)032:1257: sangs rgyas dge 'dun byed pa'i chos //
NK001(ka)032:1258: mi slob pa dang gnyis ka dang //
NK001(ka)032:1260: zhes skyabs 'gro'i yul du gyur pa'i dkon mchog gsum ste /
NK001(ka)032:1262: de la yid ches kyi dad pa dang ldan pa'i sgo nas /
NK001(ka)032:1263: 'dir mngon sum du gyur pa ni brdar btags pa'i dkon mchog gsum ste /
NK001(ka)032:1264: de la sangs rgyas mngon du gyur pa ni /
NK001(ka)032:1265: ston pa'i sku gzugs byin brlabs kyi gzi 'od 'bar
NK001(ka)032:1266: bar bzhugs pa 'di la sangs rgyas dngos kyi 'du
NK001(ka)032:1267: shes zhog / chos mngon du gyur pa ni /
NK001(ka)032:1268: 'dir bzhugs pa'i dge slong rnams bslab pa rin po
NK001(ka)032:1269: che la nan tan snying por mdzad pas sgrub pa'i
NK001(ka)032:1270: chos dang / lung gi chos kyang las kyi cho ga dngos su yod pa 'dis tshang /
NK001(ka)032:1271: ston pa mngon du gyur pa ni sangs rgyas dang zlos pas dge 'dun la 'chad cing /
NK001(ka)032:1273: kha skong gi chos dang ldan pa /
NK001(ka)032:1274: mi mthun pa gnyis dang bral ba dgos pa las /
NK001(ka)032:1275: grangs ni yul dbus dang mtha' khob kyi khyad par gyis /
NK001(ka)032:1276: bcu tshogs dang lnga tshogs yan chad tshang dgos pa la /
NK001(ka)032:1277: bod 'di mtha' khob yin kyang dge 'dun gyi grangs yul dbus dang mthun par bzhugs /
NK001(ka)032:1279: gal te lnga tshogs yin na /
NK001(ka)032:1280: bod 'di mtha' khob yin pas grangs tshang bar bzhugs /
NK001(ka)032:1282: kha skong gi chos la 'di chos phyogs pa'i las
NK001(ka)032:1283: yin pas mi 'dug par 'greng ba ma yin pa
NK001(ka)032:1284: sogs bcu gsum dang ldan dgos shing /
NK001(ka)032:1285: de'i nang nas kyang dka' shos 'khrul bcas ma yin
NK001(ka)032:1286: pa zhes bsdam bya'i nyes byas tshun chod kyis ma
NK001(ka)032:1288: ltung mthun byin brlabs byas pa tshun chad kyis tshang /
NK001(ka)032:1289: ma 'dus pa dang 'dus pa phyir bzlog gi mi mthun pa gnyis dang bral ba dgos te /
NK001(ka)032:1291: 'dus pa rnams kyang cang mi gsungs pa'i tshul gyis gnang ba ster bar bzhugs pas tshang /
NK001(ka)032:1292: mkhan po mngon du gyur pa ni /
NK001(ka)032:1293: brtan mkhas kyi yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang
NK001(ka)032:1294: ldan pa la gsol ba btab cing zhal gyis bzhes
NK001(ka)032:1295: pa zhig dgos na de yang tshang /
NK001(ka)032:1296: slob dpon mngon du gyur pa la gnyis las /
NK001(ka)032:1297: gsang ste ston pa'i slob dpon kha skong gi chos dang ldan zhing /
NK001(ka)032:1299: lkog tu bar chad dris nas nang du 'ong ba zhu ba la mkhas pa /
NK001(ka)032:1300: dge 'dun gyi las kyi bskos shing chags pa dgos na de yang tshang /
NK001(ka)032:1301: las kyi slob dpon kha skong bar 'os pa dge
NK001(ka)032:1302: 'dun gyi dbus su las kyi cho ga brda sprod
NK001(ka)032:1303: pa la mkhas pa zhig dgos te bdag gis bgyid
NK001(ka)032:1304: pas / gang las blang ba'i yul rnams mngon sum du gyur par bzhugs pa yin /
NK001(ka)032:1305: len pa po bsnyen par rdzogs 'dod mngon du gyur pa ni /
NK001(ka)032:1306: khyed rang gi steng nas rtsi ste /
NK001(ka)032:1309: bsgrub bya bzhir ma longs shing /
NK001(ka)032:1310: bsnyen rdzogs kyi sdom pa dang sdom ros rgyud ma bkag pa /
NK001(ka)032:1311: nyes med kyi sdom pa skye ba la tshig snga
NK001(ka)032:1312: ma dge tshul man chad thob cing ma nyams pa
NK001(ka)032:1314: bsam rten la rgyu'i kun slong zhe thag pa nas sdom pa len 'dod dgos te /
NK001(ka)032:1315: khyod rang gis don du gnyer nas bsgrubs pas tshang zhing /
NK001(ka)032:1316: dus kyi kun slong sdom pa thob dus thob shes kyi- bsam pa skye rung zhig dgos te /
NK001(ka)032:1317: . yang khyed la skye rung du yod cing /
NK001(ka)032:1318: nged kyis kyang brda sprod pa yin /
NK001(ka)032:1319: 'gal rkyen nges pa lnga dang bral ba zhig dgos te /
NK001(ka)032:1320: sems can che ge mo zhig la spong ngo zhes pa lta bu sems can nges pa dang /
NK001(ka)032:1321: yul ga ge mo zhig tu bsrung ngo- zhes pa lta bu yul nges pa dang /
NK001(ka)032:1322: zla ba gcig gam lo gcig gi bar du bsrung ngo zhes pa lta bu dus nges pa dang /
NK001(ka)032:1323: 'thab rtsod kyi tshe ma gtogs bsrung ngo zhes pa lta bu tshe nges pa dang /
NK001(ka)032:1324: dge slong gi bslab bya las phra zhing phra ba
NK001(ka)032:1325: rnams bsrung mi nus pas rags pa 'ga' zhig bsrung
NK001(ka)032:1326: snyam pa lta bu yan lag nges pa ste /
NK001(ka)032:1327: nges pa de rnams dang bral ba zhig dgos /
NK001(ka)032:1328: mthun rkyen phun tshogs gsum dang ldan pa zhig dgos te /
NK001(ka)032:1329: blang bya'i yul mkhan slob dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang /
NK001(ka)032:1330: byed pa las kyi cho ga la sdom pa skye
NK001(ka)032:1331: ba'i nus pa yod snyam pa yid ches kyi dad
NK001(ka)032:1333: rang nyid kyis kyang bslab bya la tshul bzhin du
NK001(ka)032:1334: slob nus so snyam pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa
NK001(ka)032:1335: zhig dgos / . thams cad myang 'das kyi bsam
NK001(ka)032:1336: pas zin pa zhig dgos te tshe 'di'i sdug basngala
NK001(ka)032:1338: phyi ma ngan song gi sdug basngala las skyob pa'i- che.-du len pa 'jigs skyob kyi tshul khrims dang /
NK001(ka)032:1340: phyi mar lha mi'i bde 'bras 'dod nas len pa legs smon kyi tshul khrims tsam las /
NK001(ka)032:1341: . gnyis so thar gyi sdom par mi 'gyur te /
NK001(ka)032:1342: so sor thar ba'i sdom pa 'di ni nges par 'byung ba'i tshul khrims yin pas /
NK001(ka)032:1343: sdug basngala can gyi 'khor ba las thar pa myang 'das thob pa'i che.-du blang dgos /
NK001(ka)032:1344: . yang thar pa'i mchog rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
NK001(ka)032:1345: go 'phang yin pas bsam pa 'di bzhin du gyis
NK001(ka)032:1346: / khams gsum 'khor ba na rgyu ba'i sems can
NK001(ka)032:1347: 'di thams cad 'dod pa bde ba 'dod kyang thams
NK001(ka)032:1348: / mi mkhas pas / la la ni sdug basngala
NK001(ka)032:1349: gyi rgyu mi dge ba rngam po che la spyo.
NK001(ka)032:1350: / mi mkhas pas / / la la ni las
NK001(ka)032:1351: ngan gyi 'bras bu sdug basngala dngos kyi yo lang
NK001(ka)032:1352: la spyod pas nyam thag pa 'di rnams snying re
NK001(ka)032:1354: snying rje ba'i sar bzhag pas mi phan rnam grol
NK001(ka)032:1355: gtan gyi bde ba la 'god dgos /
NK001(ka)032:1356: de'i nus pa da lta bdag la mi 'dug pas /
NK001(ka)032:1357: 'gro kun sgrol nus pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang thob par bya /
NK001(ka)032:1359: rgyu tshogs rgya chen po bsags /
NK001(ka)032:1360: spang bya sgrib pa ma lus pa spong dgos /
NK001(ka)032:1361: de'i spang gnyen ting nge 'dzin las byung ba'i zag
NK001(ka)032:1362: med kyi shes rab bskyed pa'i gzhi ni tshul khrims
NK001(ka)032:1363: rnam par dag pa la rag las pa yin te
NK001(ka)032:1365: tshul khrims la brten tshul khrims la gnas na //
NK001(ka)032:1366: rim gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag /
NK001(ka)032:1367: yang dag ji lta ba bzhin rtogs par 'gyur //
NK001(ka)032:1369: .sa na so sor thar pa'i sdom pa'i mchog ba
NK001(ka)032:1370: snyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi sdom pa yin
NK001(ka)032:1371: pas / . blangs la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du legs par bsrung snyam pa gyis /
NK001(ka)032:1372: yo byad mngon du gyur pa ni /
NK001(ka)032:1373: chos gos gsum dngos sam rgyur rung ba dang /
NK001(ka)032:1374: lhung bze.-rung ba tshad ldan dge 'dun la bstan pa rnams mkhan pos byin gyis brlabs te /
NK001(ka)032:1376: gding pa dang chu tshags kyang mkhan pos tshig gis gnang ba dgos te /
NK001(ka)032:1377: brnyan po tshun chad kyis tshang ba yin /
NK001(ka)032:1378: yongs su dag pa mngon du gyur pa ni /
NK001(ka)032:1379: 'gal rkyen bar chad kyi chos dang mi ldan pa zhig dgos te /
NK001(ka)032:1380: gsang ston gyi lkog tu dris shing /
NK001(ka)032:1381: kho bos kyang dge 'dun gyi dbus su dris pa
NK001(ka)032:1382: la khyed rang gis lan btab pa'i sgo nas bar
NK001(ka)032:1383: chad med par rtogs pas tshangs ba yin /
NK001(ka)032:1384: gsol ba mngon du gyur pa ni /
NK001(ka)032:1385: bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i phyir bsam pa thag pa nas
NK001(ka)032:1386: dge 'dun la gsol ba lan gsum btab pa des
NK001(ka)032:1387: tshang ba yin / las mngon du gyur pa ni /
NK001(ka)032:1388: gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyi cho ga tshang la ma nor ma 'khrugs pa zhig dgos te /
NK001(ka)032:1389: da lta nyid du kho bos sgrub pas tshang bar gda' /
NK001(ka)032:1390: . ltar na mngon du gyur pa bcus sdom pa skye ba'i rgyu tshogs thams cad tshang ba yin /
NK001(ka)032:1391: de la mdo sde pa yan chad /
NK001(ka)032:1392: nges 'byung gi bsam pas nyer len gyi rgyu byas /
NK001(ka)032:1393: mngon du gyur pa bcus lhan cig byed rkyen byas te /
NK001(ka)032:1394: dge slong gi sdom pa sems pa dge ba sa
NK001(ka)032:1395: bon dang bcas pa'i ngo bor skye bar bzhed na'ng
NK001(ka)032:1396: / gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba'i sde pa rang gi grub mtha' dang bstun na /
NK001(ka)032:1397: rgyu drug dang rkyen bzhi las /
NK001(ka)032:1398: rgyu'i rkyen rang rgyud kyi 'byung ba bzhi dang /
NK001(ka)032:1399: bdag po'i rkyen gzhan gyi rnam par rig byed de rkyen gnyis la brten nas /
NK001(ka)032:1402: {la mnyam ste rgyu gsum gyis bsnyen par rdzogs pa
NK001(ka)032:1403: dge slong gi sdom pa rnam par rig byed dang
NK001(ka)032:1404: rig byed ma yin pa gnyis kyis bsdus pa'i gzugs
NK001(ka)032:1405: rdzas bdun nam spong ba bdun ldan gyi ngo bor
NK001(ka)032:1408: dkon mchog gsum mkhan slob dge 'dun dang bcas pa la sems dang ba'i sgo nas /
NK001(ka)032:1409: sems can thams cad kyi don du rnam grol gtan
NK001(ka)032:1410: gyi bde ba rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang
NK001(ka)032:1411: thob par bya / de'i ched du bdag gis bsnyen rdzogs kyi sdom pa blangs la /
NK001(ka)032:1412: dus deng nas ji srid ma shi'i bar du dge slong gi spang bya mtha' dag ni spang /
NK001(ka)032:1413: gnyen po mtha' dag ni rgyud la bsten par bya
NK001(ka)032:1414: snyam du len sems dang bsrung sems kyi bsam pa
NK001(ka)032:1417: cho ga las 'das na las mi 'chags so zhes gsungs pas dge 'dun rnams spyod lam bstun /
NK001(ka)032:1418: bstan pa dang bsgrub bya la phan sems dang /
NK001(ka)032:1419: bsam pa thag pa nas las byed 'dod dang /
NK001(ka)032:1420: nges 'byung gi bsam pas zin pa ste thugs dgongs
NK001(ka)032:1421: gsum gsal btab nas gsol ba'i las la thugs gtad
NK001(ka)032:1422: par zhu zhing / chad lhag byung na gso bar zhu /
NK001(ka)032:1423: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
NK001(ka)032:1424: ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di mkhan po ming 'di-
NK001(ka)032:1425: zhes bgyi bas dge 'dun las bsnyen par rdzogs par
NK001(ka)032:1426: 'tshal nas / ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di mkhan
NK001(ka)032:1427: po ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dge 'dun las bsnyen
NK001(ka)032:1430: skyes pa'i dbang po dang yang ldan /
NK001(ka)032:1432: 'di'i chos gos gsum dang lhung bzed kyang tshang /
NK001(ka)032:1433: bar chad kyi chos rnams kyang yongs su dag go zhes kho na nyid mchi ste /
NK001(ka)032:1434: ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di mkhan po ming 'di
NK001(ka)032:1435: zhes bgyi bas dge 'dun las bsnyen par rdzogs par
NK001(ka)032:1436: gsol na / gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na /
NK001(ka)032:1437: dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /
NK001(ka)032:1438: dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba mkhan po
NK001(ka)032:1439: ming 'di zhes bgyi bas bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad
NK001(ka)032:1442: las byed pa dang po la thugs gtad par zhu /
NK001(ka)032:1443: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
NK001(ka)032:1444: ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di mkhan po ming 'di
NK001(ka)032:1445: zhes bgyi bas dge 'dun las bsnyen par rdzogs par
NK001(ka)032:1446: 'tshal nas / ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di mkhan
NK001(ka)032:1447: po ming 'di- zhes bgyi bas dge 'dun las bsnyen
NK001(ka)032:1450: skyes pa'i dbang po dang yang ldan /
NK001(ka)032:1452: 'di'i chos gos gsum dang lhung bzed kyang tshang /
NK001(ka)032:1453: bar chad kyi chos rnams kyang yongs su dag go zhes kho na nyid mchi ste /
NK001(ka)032:1454: ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di mkhan po ming 'di
NK001(ka)032:1455: zhes bgyi bas dge 'dun las bsnyen par rdzogs par
NK001(ka)032:1456: gsol na / de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis ming
NK001(ka)032:1457: 'di- zhes bgyi ba 'di mkhan po ming 'di zhes
NK001(ka)032:1458: bgyi bas bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad na /
NK001(ka)032:1459: tshe dang ldan pa gang dag ming 'di zhes bgyi
NK001(ka)032:1460: ba mkhan po ming 'di zhes bgyi bas bsnyen par
NK001(ka)032:1461: rdzogs par mdzad pa bzod pa de dag ni cang
NK001(ka)032:1462: ma gsung zhig / gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /
NK001(ka)032:1463: las barjoda pa dang po thal /
NK001(ka)032:1464: gnyis pa la thugs gtad par zhu byas la /
NK001(ka)032:1466: las barjoda pa gnyis pa thal /
NK001(ka)032:1467: gsum pa'i skabs su las 'chags pa yin te /
NK001(ka)032:1469: barjoda pa tha ma gang yin pa'i cha gsum pa la grub pa nyid do //
NK001(ka)032:1471: kho na nyid mchi ste yan chad ngo bo barjoda pa /
NK001(ka)032:1472: . nas bsnyen par rdzogs par gsol na zhes pa'i bya ba barjoda pa /
NK001(ka)032:1473: de'i slad du man chad byed pa barjoda pa yin pas /
NK001(ka)032:1474: barjoda pa dang po gnyis rdzogs pa gsol na /
NK001(ka)032:1475: zhes pa de 'gag pa dang mnyam du khyod la sdom pa skye /
NK001(ka)032:1476: nged slob dpon du 'gyur ba yin /
NK001(ka)032:1477: de'i slad du zhes pa'i tshig byung ba na sdom
NK001(ka)032:1478: pa skyes tshar bas bdag dge slong du gyur snyam
NK001(ka)032:1479: du rdzogs pa'i 'du shes bskyed pa gal che bas
NK001(ka)032:1480: sems ma yengs par gtad mdzo. /
NK001(ka)032:1481: dge 'dun rnams barjoda pa gsum pa la thugs gtad par zhu- byas la /
NK001(ka)032:1483: las barjoda pa gsum pa thal /
NK001(ka)032:1484: las kyi mjug sdud la thugs gtad par zhu /
NK001(ka)032:1485: dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas /
NK001(ka)032:1486: dge 'dun gyi ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di mkhan
NK001(ka)032:1487: po ming 'di- zhes bgyi bas bsnyen par rdzogs par
NK001(ka)032:1488: mdzad lags te / 'di ltar cang mi gsungs pas de de bzhin du 'dzin no //
NK001(ka)032:1489: gal te cho ga nor ba'am dge slong song ba
NK001(ka)032:1490: la sogs pas las 'khrugs nas gsol ba bskyar dgos
NK001(ka)032:1491: na / btsun pa dag yang gsol ba bagyi'o //
NK001(ka)032:1494: btsun pa dag yang rjes su sgrog go byas la skyor /
NK001(ka)032:1496: btsun pa dag yang gsol ba bgyi zhing rjes su yang sgrog go- byas ba bskyar ro //
NK001(ka)032:1497: . ltar na khyed kyi rgyud la bsnyen par rdzogs
NK001(ka)032:1498: pa'i sdom pa 'chal tshul gyi rgyun sdom zhing 'gog
NK001(ka)032:1499: pa chu'i chu lon lta bu de thob cing mngon
NK001(ka)032:1500: du gyur pa yin pas bdag dge slong gi dngos
NK001(ka)032:1501: por gyur to snyam du dga' ba sgoms shig /
NK001(ka)032:1502: .sa dngos gzhi grub nas mjug gi cho ga la gnyis yod pa'i /
NK001(ka)032:1503: dang po rdzogs pa'i-dus go ba de dge slong che ge mos mdzod cig /
NK001(ka)032:1505: .sa kyang nyin mo yin na nyi ma rdzogs pa'i sar phyin te /
NK001(ka)032:1506: thur ma sor bzhi pas gzhal zhing /
NK001(ka)032:1507: grib ma sor re la rkang pa dang /
NK001(ka)032:1508: bzhi la skyes bu zhes bya ba'i tha snyad dang snga phyi'i cha yang nges par bya /
NK001(ka)032:1509: mtshan mo yin na skar khongs kyis thun tshad nges par byas nas /
NK001(ka)032:1510: khyod bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong du sgrub pa'i cho ga la sbyor dngos rjes gsum yod pa'i /
NK001(ka)032:1511: sbyor dngos gnyis kyis khyod kyi rgyud la dge slong gi sdom pa thob pa yin /
NK001(ka)032:1512: da mjug chog la gnyis yod pa'i dang po bsnyen
NK001(ka)032:1513: bkur gyi gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes pa'i
NK001(ka)032:1514: phyir rdzogs pa'i dus go ba'i dbang du byas na
NK001(ka)032:1517: zhes pa'i bar sngar ltar las /
NK001(ka)032:1518: . nas las kyi slob dpon che ge dang /
NK001(ka)032:1519: gsang ste ston pa'i slob dpon che ge dang /
NK001(ka)032:1520: dad pa'i dge 'dun grangs tshang ba'i dbus su bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i sdom pa thob pa yin pas /
NK001(ka)032:1523: rang bas bslab pa rgan pas rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong mtshan mthun pa rnams yin /
NK001(ka)032:1525: rang las dus kyis gzhon pa'i dge slong rnams dang /
NK001(ka)032:1526: rgan yangs gzhan na gnas pa sogs dmigs bsal gsung pa rnams dang /
NK001(ka)032:1527: dge slong ma rgan gzhon thams cad dang /
NK001(ka)032:1528: bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa'i rab byung rnams dang /
NK001(ka)032:1529: dge bsnyen man chad khyim pa thams cad yin /
NK001(ka)032:1530: . yang rgan gzhon gyi khyad par zhes pa nas /
NK001(ka)032:1531: phyag dang bsnyen bkur stob pa byung na dang du long /
NK001(ka)032:1532: . ltar rtsis pas dge slong nang dus mnyam pa byung na /
NK001(ka)032:1534: de la gsan pas mchi bar gda' /
NK001(ka)032:1535: zhes pa'i bar sngar ltar ro //
NK001(ka)032:1537: dge ba'i bshes gnyen pas gsungs pa de rnams kyang
NK001(ka)032:1538: sems la bzhag nas lag len la thebs pa bya
NK001(ka)032:1539: dgos / da mjug chog gnyis pa thob pa mi
NK001(ka)032:1540: nyams shing 'phel bar bya ba'i ched du gdams ngag
NK001(ka)032:1542: . yang khyod kyis dge slong gi sdom pa thob pa tsam gyis mi chog /
NK001(ka)032:1543: gces spras kyi sgo nas bsrung dgos la /
NK001(ka)032:1544: de'i blang dor rnams shes pa'i don du gdams ngag bcu gcig gsungs pa rnams kyang /
NK001(ka)032:1546: yul can gnyen po la gdams pa gnyis su 'du zhing /
NK001(ka)032:1547: bslab bya yul la gdams pa la'ng /
NK001(ka)032:1548: bslab bya'i gtso bo rnams dngos su barjoda pa dang /
NK001(ka)032:1549: ma barjoda pa gzhan du kha 'phangs pa gnyis las //
NK001(ka)032:1550: ga mar bslab bya'i gtso bo rnams dngos su barjoda pa'i skabs yin /
NK001(ka)032:1551: de la rnam dag rnam pa bzhi las /
NK001(ka)032:1552: dang po brten bya 'tsho ba rnam dag la gdams pa ni /
NK001(ka)032:1553: . ltar legs par thob pa'i tshangs spyod mi nyams
NK001(ka)032:1554: pa'i ched du mtha' gnyis spangs pa'i gnas bzhi la
NK001(ka)032:1555: brten dgos zhes spyir 'doms pa ni 'di yin te
NK001(ka)032:1556: / tshe dang ldan pa ming 'di- zhes bya ba khyod nyon cig /
NK001(ka)032:1558: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
NK001(ka)032:1559: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen cing gzigs
NK001(ka)032:1560: pa des / . ltar rab tu byung ba dang
NK001(ka)032:1561: bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi gnas su gsungs
NK001(ka)032:1562: pa des / te / de la gnas na dge
NK001(ka)032:1563: slong legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba rab tu
NK001(ka)032:1564: byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi
NK001(ka)032:1566: bye brag tu gdams pa la bzhi las /
NK001(ka)032:1567: gos mtha' gnyis su ma ltung ba bsten par gdams pa la'ng /
NK001(ka)032:1568: bzang po don du gnyer ba'i 'dod pa bsod nyams kyi mtha' spangs te /
NK001(ka)032:1569: gos ngan ngon tsam gyis chog shes par gyis shig ces 'doms pa ni /
NK001(ka)032:1571: gos kyi nang na phyag dar khrod ni rung ba rnyed kyang sla ba ste /
NK001(ka)032:1572: de la gnas na dge slong legs par gsungs pa'i
NK001(ka)032:1573: chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen
NK001(ka)032:1574: par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos por 'gyur ro
NK001(ka)032:1575: // ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod ji srid 'tsho
NK001(ka)032:1576: ba'i bar du phyag dar khrod kyi gos kyis 'tsho
NK001(ka)032:1579: gos bzang po kar+sha pa na 'bum ri ba yang
NK001(ka)032:1580: 'bad rtsol med pas rnyed cing zhen chags mi skye
