NK001(ka)032:1581: na longs spyod pas chog go zhes ngal zhing dub
NK001(ka)032:1582: pa'i mtha' spong bar gdams pa ni /
NK001(ka)032:1583: lhag par rnyed na dar ram /
NK001(ka)032:1592: yul ka shi ka'i ras phran nam /
NK001(ka)032:1602: gzhan yang gos rung ba gang dge 'dun nam gang zag las rnyed na /
NK001(ka)032:1603: . yang khyod kyis longs la tshod zin par gyis shig /
NK001(ka)032:1604: ji ltar khyod gnas 'di lta bu la dam 'cha' 'am /
NK001(ka)032:1607: gnyis pa zas mtha' gnyis su ma lhung ba bsten par gdams pa la'ng /
NK001(ka)032:1608: bzang po don du gnyer ba'i 'dod pa bsod nyams
NK001(ka)032:1609: kyi mtha' spangs te zas ngan ngon tsam gyis chog
NK001(ka)032:1610: shes par gyis shig ces 'doms pa ni /
NK001(ka)032:1611: ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod nyon cig /
NK001(ka)032:1612: zas kyi nang na bsod snyoms ni rung ba rnyed kyang sla ba ste /
NK001(ka)032:1613: de la gnas na dge slong legs par gsungs pa'i
NK001(ka)032:1614: chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen
NK001(ka)032:1615: par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos por 'gyur ro
NK001(ka)032:1616: // ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod ji srid 'tsho
NK001(ka)032:1617: ba'i bar du bsod snyoms kyi zas kyis 'tsho bar
NK001(ka)032:1619: zas bzang po ro brgya pa yang 'bad rtsol med
NK001(ka)032:1620: pas rnyed cing zhen chags mi skye na longs spyod
NK001(ka)032:1621: pas chog go zhes ngal zhing dub pa'i mtha' spong
NK001(ka)032:1623: lhag par rnyed na 'bras chen nam /
NK001(ka)032:1634: gzhan yang zas rung ba gang dge 'dun nam gang
NK001(ka)032:1635: zag las rnyed na de yang khyod kyis longs la
NK001(ka)032:1637: ji ltar khyod gnas 'di lta bu la dam 'cha' 'am /
NK001(ka)032:1639: gsum pa gnas mal mtha' gnyis su ma lhungs pa brten par gdams pa la'ng /
NK001(ka)032:1640: bzang po don du gnyer ba 'dod pa bsod nyams
NK001(ka)032:1641: kyi mtha' spangs te shing drung gi gnas mal tsam
NK001(ka)032:1642: gyis chog shes par gyis shig ces 'doms pa ni
NK001(ka)032:1643: / ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod nyon cig /
NK001(ka)032:1644: gnas mal gyi nang na shing drung ni rung ba rnyed kyang sla ba ste /
NK001(ka)032:1645: de la gnas na dge slong legs par gsungs pa'i
NK001(ka)032:1646: chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen
NK001(ka)032:1647: par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos por 'gyur ro
NK001(ka)032:1648: // ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod ji srid 'tsho
NK001(ka)032:1649: ba'i bar du shing drung gi gnas mal gyis 'tsho
NK001(ka)032:1651: khang pa brtsegs pa lnga brgya pa yang 'bad rtsol
NK001(ka)032:1652: med pas rnyed cing zhen chags mi skye na longs
NK001(ka)032:1653: spyod pas chog go zhes ngal zhing dub pa'i mtha'
NK001(ka)032:1655: lhag par rnyed na khang pa'am /
NK001(ka)032:1662: sgo khang gi steng gi bsil khang ngam /
NK001(ka)032:1663: khang steng gi yol khang ngam /
NK001(ka)032:1674: bya skyibs su ma byas pa'am /
NK001(ka)032:1675: gzhan yang gnas mal rung ba gang dge 'dun nam gang zag las rnyed na /
NK001(ka)032:1676: . yang khyod kyis longs la tshod zin par gyis shig /
NK001(ka)032:1677: ji ltar khyod gnas 'di lta bu la dam 'cha' 'am /
NK001(ka)032:1679: bzhi pa sman mtha' gnyis su ma lhung ba bsten par gdams pa la'ng /
NK001(ka)032:1680: bzang po don du gnyer ba 'dod pa bsod nyams
NK001(ka)032:1681: kyi mtha' spangs te gzhan gyis khu ba bkus shing
NK001(ka)032:1682: bor ba snyigs ma tsam gyis chog shes par gyis
NK001(ka)032:1684: ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod nyon cig /
NK001(ka)032:1685: sman gyi nang na bkus te bor ba ni rung brnyed kyang sla ba ste /
NK001(ka)032:1686: de la gnas na dge slong legs par gsungs pa'i
NK001(ka)032:1687: chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen
NK001(ka)032:1688: par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos por 'gyur ro
NK001(ka)032:1689: // ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod ji srid 'tsho
NK001(ka)032:1690: ba'i bar du bkus te bor ba'i sman gyis 'tsho
NK001(ka)032:1692: sman bzang po ro nus phun sum tshogs pa'ng 'bad
NK001(ka)032:1693: rtsol med par rnyed cing zhen chags mi skye na
NK001(ka)032:1694: longs spyad pas chog go zhes ngal zhing dub pa'i
NK001(ka)032:1695: mtha' spang bar gdams pa ni /
NK001(ka)032:1696: lhag par rnyed na zhun mar ram /
NK001(ka)032:1709: gzhan yang sman rung ba gang dge 'dun nam gang zag las rnyed na /
NK001(ka)032:1710: . yang khyod kyis longs la tshod zin par gyis shig /
NK001(ka)032:1711: ji ltar khyod gnas 'di lta bu la dam 'cha' 'am /
NK001(ka)032:1714: . rnams kyis brten bya 'tsho ba rnam dag la gdams pa song nas /
NK001(ka)032:1715: gnyis pa bsrung bya tshul khrims rnam dag la gdams pa ni /
NK001(ka)032:1716: dge slong gi dngos po 'jig par byed pa phas
NK001(ka)032:1717: pham bzhi cha dang bcas pa spang dgos so zhes
NK001(ka)032:1718: 'doms pa la spyi dang bye brag gnyis las /
NK001(ka)032:1720: ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod nyon cig /
NK001(ka)032:1721: bzhi-0 'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
NK001(ka)032:1722: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
NK001(ka)032:1723: rgyas mkhyen cing gzigs pa des de ltar rab tu-
NK001(ka)032:1724: byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi
NK001(ka)032:1725: ltung bar 'gyur pa'i chos su gsungs te /
NK001(ka)032:1726: dge slong gis de dag byas na byas ma thag tu dge slong du mi rung bar 'gyur /
NK001(ka)032:1729: dge slong gi dngos po las nyams par 'gyur te /
NK001(ka)032:1730: de'i dge sbyong gi tshul zhig par 'gyur zhing /
NK001(ka)032:1731: nyams pa bcom pa ltung ba pham par 'gyur ba ste /
NK001(ka)032:1732: de'i dge sbyong gi tshul phyir blang du med par 'gyur ro //
NK001(ka)032:1734: .0ra na shing t+aa la'i mgo bo bcad na sngon por 'gyur du mi rung la /
NK001(ka)032:1735: 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang yangs par 'gyur du mi rung ba bzhin no //
NK001(ka)032:1736: bye brag tu gdams pa la bzhi las /
NK001(ka)032:1737: dang po nang sems can la chags pa mi tshangs
NK001(ka)032:1738: spyod cha dang bcas pa spong dgos zhes 'doms pa
NK001(ka)032:1744: 'dod pa la lhag par zhen pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas smad do //
NK001(ka)032:1745: 'dod pa spangs pa ni basngagasa te /
NK001(ka)032:1756: tshe dang ldan pa khyod deng phyin chad chags pa'i
NK001(ka)032:1757: sems kyi bud med kyi yul la mig gtad de
NK001(ka)032:1758: / mig gis blta bar yang mi bya na /
NK001(ka)032:1760: gnyis sprad de mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten pa lta smos kyang ci dgos /
NK001(ka)032:1761: tshe dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
NK001(ka)032:1762: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
NK001(ka)032:1763: rgyas mkhyen cing gzigs pa des /
NK001(ka)032:1764: yang dge slong gang dge slong rnams dang lhan cig bslab pa mtshungs par gyur pas /
NK001(ka)032:1766: bslab pa nyams par ma byas par /
NK001(ka)032:1767: mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten na
NK001(ka)032:1768: tha na dud 'gro'i- skyes gnas su skyes pa dang
NK001(ka)032:1770: dge slong de pham par gyur pa yin gyis gnas par mi bya'o //
NK001(ka)032:1771: zhes bya ba 'di bka' stsal te /
NK001(ka)032:1772: dge slong gis gnas de lta bu byas na byas
NK001(ka)032:1773: ma thag tu dge slong du mi rung bar 'gyur
NK001(ka)032:1776: dge slong gi dngos po las nyams par 'gyur te /
NK001(ka)032:1777: de'i dge sbyong gi tshul zhig par 'gyur zhing /
NK001(ka)032:1778: nyams pa bcom pa ltung ba pham par gyur pa ste /
NK001(ka)032:1779: de'i dge sbyong gi tshul phyir blang du med par 'gyur ro //
NK001(ka)032:1781: .0ra na shing t+aa la'i mgo bo bcad na sngon por 'gyur du mi rung la /
NK001(ka)032:1782: 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang yangs par 'gyur du mi rung ba bzhin no //
NK001(ka)032:1783: .nga phyin chad khyod spyod pa ma yin pa dang /
NK001(ka)032:1784: bya ba ma yin pa dang /
NK001(ka)032:1785: spyad pa ma yin pa spang ba de la dran pa dang /
NK001(ka)032:1786: bag yod pas sems shin tu bsrung bar brtson par gyis shig /

NK001(ka)032:1973: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i 'du shes dang /
NK001(ka)032:1976: mi sdug pa'i rnam par sngos pa'i rnam par brnag

NK001(ka)032:2000: bdag ni dgra bcom pa rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa dang /

NK001(ka)032:2014: bya ba ma yin pa dang /

NK001(ka)032:2018: ji ltar gnas 'di lta bu la mi spyod dam /
NK001(ka)032:2021: . rnams kyis bsrung bya tshul khrims rnam dag la gdams pa song nas /
NK001(ka)032:2022: gsum pa nyams len spyod pa rnam dag la gdams pa la lnga yod pa'i /
NK001(ka)032:2023: dang po sems can la phar mi gnod par ma
NK001(ka)032:2024: zad tshur la gnod pa 'byung yang lan mi byed
NK001(ka)032:2025: par bzod par bya dgos zhes 'doms pa ni 'di
NK001(ka)032:2026: yin te / tshe dang ldan pa khyod nyon cig /
NK001(ka)032:2027: bzhi po 'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
NK001(ka)032:2028: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
NK001(ka)032:2029: sangs rgyas mkhyen cing gzigs pa des /
NK001(ka)032:2030: . ltar rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs
NK001(ka)032:2031: pa dge slong gi dge sbyong du byed pa'i chos
NK001(ka)032:2032: su gsungs te / bzhi gang zhe na /
NK001(ka)032:2033: tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis deng phyin chad gshe yang slar mi gshe bar bya ba dang /
NK001(ka)032:2034: khros kyang slar mi khro bar bya ba dang /
NK001(ka)032:2035: brdegs kyang slar mi rdeg par bya ba dang /
NK001(ka)032:2036: mtshang brus kyang lar mtshang mi 'bru bar bya'o //
NK001(ka)032:2037: ji ltar gnas 'di lta bu la spyod dam /
NK001(ka)032:2039: gnyis pa blang dor gyi gnas de rnams nyams su
NK001(ka)032:2040: len pa shin tu dka' bas bdag gis mi nus
NK001(ka)032:2041: snyam na / gzhan gyis dbang med du len du bcug pa ma yin gyi /
NK001(ka)032:2042: khyod rang snga mo nas mchog tu 'dod cing don
NK001(ka)032:2043: du gnyer ba gang yin pa de grub pa yin
NK001(ka)032:2044: pas / da gnyen po bskyed nas srungs shig ces
NK001(ka)032:2045: mchog tu 'dod pa'i don grub par gdams pa ni
NK001(ka)032:2046: pas / 'di yin te / tshe dang ldan pa khyod nyon cig /
NK001(ka)032:2047: khyod sngon bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba
NK001(ka)032:2048: la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa
NK001(ka)032:2049: dge slong gi dngos po thob kyang ci ma rung
NK001(ka)032:2050: snyam du smon pa gang yin pa de /
NK001(ka)032:2051: da khyod mkhan por 'os pa dang /
NK001(ka)032:2052: slob dpon du 'os pa gnyis dang /
NK001(ka)032:2054: gsol ba dang bzhi'i las mi g.yo ba bzhag par
NK001(ka)032:2055: mi 'os pas rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs
NK001(ka)032:2056: so // gsum pa bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya
NK001(ka)032:2057: lon pa'i dge slong dang khyod gnyis don gsum gyis
NK001(ka)032:2059: gnas brtan bsgres po rnams kyis ji ltar slob pa
NK001(ka)032:2060: bzhin du bslab dgos zhes 'doms pa ni 'di yin
NK001(ka)032:2061: te / tshe dang ldan pa khyod nyon cig /
NK001(ka)032:2062: bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i dge- slong
NK001(ka)032:2063: gis bslab pa gang la bslab par bya ba de
NK001(ka)032:2064: la de ring bsnyen par rdzogs pas kyang bslab bo
NK001(ka)032:2065: // . ring bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong gis
NK001(ka)032:2066: bslab pa gang la bslab par bya ba de la
NK001(ka)032:2067: bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pas kyang bslab
NK001(ka)032:2068: // bo // . ltar na tshul khrims nyid kyis mnyam pa dang /
NK001(ka)032:2069: bslab pa nyid kyi mnyam pa dang /
NK001(ka)032:2070: so sor thar pa'i mdo 'don pa nyid kyis mnyam
NK001(ka)032:2071: pa de khyod kyis deng phyin chad bsgrub par bya'i
NK001(ka)032:2073: bzhi pa 'jig rte na pha dang bu mdzang pas phan tshun ji ltar bsten pa bzhin du /
NK001(ka)032:2074: khyod kyis mkhan po la rim gro bskyed de bsten par gyis shig dang /
NK001(ka)032:2075: .sa kyang khyod rjes su 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes 'doms pa ni 'di yin te /
NK001(ka)032:2076: .nga phyin chad khyod kyis mkhan po la pha'i 'du shes nye bar bzhag par bya'o //
NK001(ka)032:2077: mkhan pos kyang khyod bu'i 'du shes nye bar bzhag par bya'o //
NK001(ka)032:2078: khyod kyis deng phyin chad mkhan po la ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du bsnyen bkur bya'o //
NK001(ka)032:2079: mkhan pos kyang khyod shi'am sos kyi bar du nad g.yog bya'o //
NK001(ka)032:2080: lnga pa mkhan por ma zad grogs tshangs pa mtshungs
NK001(ka)032:2081: par spyod pa gzhan rnams la'ng gus pa'i sgo nas
NK001(ka)032:2082: rim gro ba bskyed par gyis shig ces 'doms pa
NK001(ka)032:2084: .nga phyin chad khyod kyis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams dang /
NK001(ka)032:2087: gsar bu rnams la gus pa dang bcas pa dang /
NK001(ka)032:2088: zhe sa dang bcas pa dang /
NK001(ka)032:2089: 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i dbang du 'gyur bar gnas par bya'o //
NK001(ka)032:2090: . rnams kyis nyams len spyod pa rnam dag la gdams pa song nas /
NK001(ka)032:2091: bzhi pa rtogs don lta ba rnam dag la gdams pa ni /
NK001(ka)032:2092: khyod dge slong gi dngos por bsgrub pa 'di sangs
NK001(ka)032:2093: rgyas kyi bstan pa la zhugs pa yongs su rdzogs
NK001(ka)032:2094: pa yin pas / sos dal du bsdad pas mi yong /
NK001(ka)032:2095: de'i bya ba thos bsam sgom gsum la brtson par byas nas /
NK001(ka)032:2096: lung sde snod gsum la mkhas pa dang /
NK001(ka)032:2097: mngon rtogs bslab pa gsum gyi rgyud phyug par byed dgos zhes ston pa 'di yin te /
NK001(ka)032:2098: .nga phyin chad khyod kyis lung nod par bya /
NK001(ka)032:2101: phung po la mkhas pa dang /
NK001(ka)032:2103: skye mched la mkhas pa dang /
NK001(ka)032:2104: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang /
NK001(ka)032:2105: gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par bya'o //
NK001(ka)032:2106: ma thob pa thob par bya ba dang /
NK001(ka)032:2107: ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba dang /
NK001(ka)032:2108: mngon du ma byas pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir khyod kyis brtson pa mi 'dor bar bya'o //
NK001(ka)032:2109: . ltar rnam dag bzhi po de bsgrub bya'i gtso bo yin pas /
NK001(ka)032:2110: ji ltar gdams pa bzhin du 'bad pas bslab dgos pa yin la /
NK001(ka)032:2111: da gnyis pa dngos su ma barjoda pa gzhan du kha 'phangs pa ni /
NK001(ka)032:2112: }ra smos pa'i bslab gzhi de tsam du ma zad
NK001(ka)032:2113: dgag sgrub kyi bslab bya dngos su ma barjoda pa
NK001(ka)032:2114: rnams kyang mkhan slob sogs kyi ston par 'gyur bas
NK001(ka)032:2115: shes par byas la phra zhing phra ba nas blang
NK001(ka)032:2116: dor ma nor bar gyis shig ches 'doms pa 'di
NK001(ka)032:2117: yin te / 'di dag ni kho bos khyod la
NK001(ka)032:2118: bslab pa'i gzhi che long che long tsam zhig barjoda
NK001(ka)032:2119: yin te / par zad de / gzhan dag ni
NK001(ka)032:2120: zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo
NK001(ka)032:2122: gzhan dag kyang slob dpon dang /
NK001(ka)032:2129: 'grogs bshes rnams kyis kyang rgya cher ston par 'gyur ro //
NK001(ka)032:2130: gnyis pa yul can gnyen po la gdams pa la gnyis kyi /
NK001(ka)032:2131: dang po bslab pa la gus par sbyar ba ste /
NK001(ka)032:2132: nyid kyis dal 'byor gyi rten phun sum tshogs pa thob cing /
NK001(ka)032:2133: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa rin po che dang mjal nas /
NK001(ka)032:2134: bstan pa'i snying po bsnyen rdzogs kyi sdom pa thob
NK001(ka)032:2135: pa 'di lta bu shin tu rnyed par dka' ba
NK001(ka)032:2136: yin pas / bslab pa rin po che la mig
NK001(ka)032:2137: gi 'bras bu ltar gces spras kyi sgo nas gus
NK001(ka)032:2138: pa bskyed de tshul bzhin du sgrubs shig ces 'doms
NK001(ka)032:2140: shes rab mchog gi bstan pa la //
NK001(ka)032:2141: khyod ni bsnyen par rdzogs par gyur //
NK001(ka)032:2143: 'di dag ji lta bzhin du sgrubs //
NK001(ka)032:2144: mdzes pa rab tu dbyung ba dang //
NK001(ka)032:2145: yongs su dag pa bsnyen rdzogs par //
NK001(ka)032:2146: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis rab mkhyen te //
NK001(ka)032:2147: bden pa'i mtshan gyis bka' stsal to //
NK001(ka)032:2148: gnyis pa thabs bag yod pa la sbyar ba ni /
NK001(ka)032:2149: . ltar bslab pa la gus pa bskyed de /
NK001(ka)032:2150: bag yod pa'i thabs kyis dge sbyong gi tshul sgrubs shig ces 'doms pa yin te /
NK001(ka)032:2151: tshe dang ldan pa khyod bsnyen par rdzogs zin gyis bag yod par sgrubs shig /
NK001(ka)032:2152: 'di ni tshig nyung yang don rgya che ste /
NK001(ka)032:2153: blang dor gyi gnas la 'jug ldog ma nor bar byed pa ni bag yod pa yin la /
NK001(ka)032:2154: sgo gsum gyi spyod pa bag yod pas dam pa'i
NK001(ka)032:2155: chos 'dul ba 'di la spyad na rnam grol gtan
NK001(ka)032:2156: gyi bde ba thob par 'gyur te /
NK001(ka)032:2158: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub dang /
NK001(ka)032:2159: gzhan yang gang dag de lta bu dang mthun pa'i
NK001(ka)032:2160: dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs rnams kyang bag
NK001(ka)032:2162: zhes gsungs pa ltar phan yon chen po mnga' bas legs par sgrub shig /
NK001(ka)032:2163: . ltar sbyor dngos rjes gsum gyis khyod bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i cho ga de grub pa yin /
NK001(ka)032:2164: . yang gtso bor mkhan po'i bdag rkyen las byung ba yin te /
NK001(ka)032:2165: rang gis mdzad 'os rang gis mdzad /
NK001(ka)032:2166: gzhan gyis byed dgos pa rnams de dang de la
NK001(ka)032:2167: bskos nas mdzad pas gtang rag gi phyag gsum 'tshol
NK001(ka)032:2168: la bka' drin che lag zhes barjoda cig /
NK001(ka)032:2169: thams cad kyis me tog 'thor bzhin du smon lam rnam bzhi gdab bo //
NK001(ka)032:2170: thar mchog zhi ba'i khang bzang du //
NK001(ka)032:2171: 'jug byed las kyi cho ga'i khrigs //
NK001(ka)032:2172: rin chen them skas lta bu 'di //
NK001(ka)032:2174: rnam dpyod shar ri'i ba gam la //
NK001(ka)032:2176: zhi 'tsho'i ring lugs snang ba che //
NK001(ka)032:2177: yun ring bstan pa'i dpal gyur cig /
NK001(ka)032:2179: tshangs spyod yon tan bdud rtsi'i chus //
NK001(ka)032:2180: nyes brgya'i dri ma drung phyungs te //
NK001(ka)032:2181: mi gnas mya ngan 'das thob shog /
NK001(ka)032:2182: ces pa 'di ni smyos kyi dge slong rmongs pa
NK001(ka)032:2183: d+harma sh+r+ais khyu mchog gi lo la o rgyan smin
